QuestionTxt:
极限$\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \infty} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\sin \frac{1}{x}}-1}{\left( 1+\frac{1}{x} \right) ^{\alpha}-\left( 1+\frac{1}{x} \right)}=A\ne 0$的充要条件是$\left( \quad \;\; \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $\alpha >1.$   
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $\alpha \ne 1.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $\alpha >0.$      
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ 与$\alpha$ 无关.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{应选}\left( \mathrm{B} \right) 
\\
\text{令}\frac{1}{x}=t, \text{则}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \infty} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\sin \frac{1}{x}}-1}{\left( 1+\frac{1}{x} \right) ^{\alpha}-\left( 1+\frac{1}{x} \right)}
\\
=\lim\limits_{t\rightarrow 0} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\sin t}-1}{\left( 1+t \right) ^{\alpha}-\left( 1+t \right)}\,\,                        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //t\rightarrow 0\text{时}\sin t\rightarrow 0\text{，}\Box \rightarrow 0\text{时，e}^{\Box}-1\sim \Box }
\\
=\lim\limits_{t\rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin t}{\left( 1+t \right) \left[ \left( 1+t \right) ^{\alpha -1}-1 \right]}\,\,                 {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\Box \rightarrow 0\text{时}\left( 1+\Box \right) ^a-1\sim a\Box }\,\,       {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  }
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }=\lim\limits_{t\rightarrow 0} \frac{t}{\left( 1+t \right) \left( \alpha -1 \right) t}\,\,
\\
=\frac{1}{\alpha -1}
\\
\text{故}\alpha \ne 1\text{是上述极限存在且不等于}0\text{的充要条件}.
\\

$$
LinkNames: 零比零型,利用等价无穷小计算极限,已知极限求参数,极限的应用

$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $1.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $-\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}.$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{答案应选（A）}.
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步：先找出函数的间断点}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} }\text{因为}f\left( x \right) =\frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}\text{，且}x\in \left[ -\pi ,\pi \right] .
\\
\text{可由函数已知}x=0\text{，}1\text{，}\pm \frac{\pi}{2}\text{时，函数不存在，为函数的间断点}.
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步：判断各间断点类别}}
\\
\text{当}x=0\text{时：}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}=1\text{，}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}=-1\text{，}
\\
\text{所以为跳跃间断点，为第一类间断点}.
\\
x=\frac{\pi}{2}\text{时：}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}=\infty .     {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{此时除了}\tan x\text{，其余值都确定}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \tan x\rightarrow \infty }
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }\text{所以为无穷间断点，第二类间断点}.
\\
x=-\frac{\pi}{2}\text{时，}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow -\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}=\infty  
\\
\text{所以为无穷间断点，第二类间断点}.
\\
x=1\text{时，}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 1} \frac{\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}+\mathrm{e} \right) \tan x}{x\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e} \right)}=\infty .  {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{此时除了e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\text{e，其余值都确定}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 1} \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e}\rightarrow 0\text{，所以}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 1} \frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{x}}-\mathrm{e}}\rightarrow \infty }
\\
\text{所以为无穷间断点，第二类间断点}.
\\
\text{所以答案应选（A）}.
\\

\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{赵康老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 含指数函数的极限,函数的间断点,连续与间断

QuestionTxt: 确定常数$a,b,c$的值，使$\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \frac{ax-\sin x}{\int_b^x{\frac{\ln \left( 1+t^3 \right)}{t}\mathrm{d}t}}=c\left( c\ne 0 \right) .$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{由}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \frac{ax-\sin x}{\int_b^x{\frac{\ln \left( 1+t^3 \right)}{t}}\mathrm{d}t}=c\ne 0\text{，且}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \text{（}ax-\sin x\text{）}=0\text{可知}
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \,\,\int_b^x{\frac{\ln \left( 1+t^3 \right)}{t}}\mathrm{d}t=0.       {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{只有当此极限为}0\text{时，和分子构成}\frac{0}{0}\text{型未定式，极限才可能存在}.}
\\
\text{又}\frac{\ln \left( 1+t^3 \right)}{t}>0\quad \left( t\ne 0 \right) \,\, \text{，则}b=0.
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \frac{ax-\sin x}{\int_0^x{\frac{\ln \left( 1+t^3 \right)}{t}}\mathrm{d}t}\,\,             {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  //\text{洛必达法则}.}
\\
=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{a-\cos x}{\ln \left( 1+x^3 \right)}}{x}\,\,               {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}   //\text{当}x\text{趋近于}0\text{时，有}\ln \left( 1+x^3 \right) \sim x^3.}
\\
=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0} \frac{a-\cos x}{x^2}-c\left( c\ne 0 \right) 
\\
\text{故必有}a=1,\text{从而}c=\frac{1}{2}.
\\
\text{综上：}a=1\text{，}b=0\text{，}c=\frac{1}{2}.
\\

\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{孙安冉老师} \right) \text{】}}
\\

$$
LinkNames: 利用洛必达法则计算极限,已知极限求参数,变限积分的极限 ,变限积分

QuestionTxt:
$ 设f\left( x \right) =\underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}\frac{x^{2n-1}+ax^2+bx}{x^{2n}+1}在\left( -\infty ,+\infty \right)$
$ 内连续,试确定常数a,b. $
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{当}\left| x \right|<1\text{时，}f\left( x \right) =ax^2+bx\,\,           {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}      // \left| x \right|<1\text{时}  \underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}x^{2n-1}=0    \underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}x^{2n}=0\text{，代入即可}}
\\
\text{当}x=1\text{时},f\left( x \right) =\frac{1}{2}\left( 1+a+b \right) 
\\
\text{当}x=-1\text{时},f\left( x \right) =\frac{1}{2}\left( -1+a+b \right) 
\\
\text{当}\left| x \right|>1\text{时，有}f\left( x \right) =\underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}\frac{x^{2n-1}+ax^2+bx}{x^{2n}+1}\,\,               {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}   //“\frac{\infty}{\infty}\text{型}”}
\\
=\underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}\frac{\frac{1}{x}+\frac{a}{x^{2n-2}}+\frac{b}{x^{2n-1}}}{1+\frac{1}{x^{2n}}}\,\,           {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}   //“\frac{\infty}{\infty}\text{型}”,\text{分子分母由多项组成，同时除以}“\text{最大项}”}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }=\frac{1}{x}
\\
\text{综上：}
\\
f\left( x \right) =\begin{cases}
	\frac{1}{x}\,\,                   \text{当}x<-1  \\
	\frac{1}{2}\left( -1+a+b \right) \,\,   \text{当}x=-1\\
	ax^2+bx\,\,           \text{当}\left| x \right|<1\\
	\frac{1}{2}\left( 1+a+b \right) \,\,     \text{当}x=1\\
	\frac{1}{x}\,\,                   \text{当}x>1\\
\end{cases}\,\,
\\
f\left( x \right) \text{在}x=-1\text{处连续}\Leftrightarrow -1=a-b=\frac{1}{2}\left( -1+a+b \right) 
\\
f\left( x \right) \text{在}x=1\text{处连续}\Leftrightarrow 1=a+b=\frac{1}{2}\left( -1+a-b \right) 
\\
\text{解得}a=0\text{，}b=1
\\

$$
LinkNames: 连续的判定,已知极限求参数,含参变量的极限,连续与间断

AnswerTxt:
$$
\text{例}10.9\text{已知曲线L的方程为}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x=t^2+1\\
	y=4t-t^2\\
\end{array}\left( t\geqslant 0 \right) \right. .
\\
\text{（}1\text{）讨论}L\text{的凹凸性；}
\\
\text{（}2\text{）过点}\left( -1,0 \right) \text{引}L\text{的切线，求切点}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) \text{，并写出切线的方程；}
\\
\text{（}3\text{）求此切线与}L\text{（对应于}x\leqslant x_0\text{的部分）及}x\text{轴所围成的平面图形的面积}.
\\
\text{【解】（}1\text{）由于}\frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\frac{\frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}}{\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}}=\frac{4-2t}{2t}=\frac{2}{t}-1,
\\
\frac{\mathrm{d}^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\left( \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} \right) =\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}\frac{\mathrm{d}t}{\mathrm{d}x}\left( \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} \right) =\left[ \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}\left( \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} \right) \right] \frac{\mathrm{d}t}{\mathrm{d}x}=\left[ \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}\left( \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} \right) \right] \frac{1}{\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}}
\\
\,\,     =\left[ \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}\left( \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} \right) \right] \frac{1}{x_{t}^{\prime}}=\left( -\frac{2}{t^2} \right) \cdot \frac{1}{2t}=-\frac{1}{t^3}\text{，}
\\
\text{当}t>0\text{时},\frac{\mathrm{d}^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}<0\text{，故}L\text{是凸的}.       {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{在区间}\left( a,b \right) \text{上},\text{当}f''\left( x \right) <0\text{时},\text{图像为凸的}.}
\\
\text{（}2\text{）因为当}t=0\text{时，}L\text{在对应点处的切线方程为}x=1\text{，不合题意，故设切点}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) 
\\
\text{对应的参数为}t_0>0\text{，则}L\text{在}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) \text{处的切线方程为}
\\
y-\left( 4t_0-t_{0}^{2} \right) =\left( \frac{2}{t_0}-1 \right) \left( x-t_{0}^{2}-1 \right) .
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{已知切点}\left( x_A,y_A \right) \text{及斜率}k\text{切线方程}:y-y_A=k\left( x-x_A \right) ,\text{其中}k\text{为}\left( 1 \right) \text{中的}\frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}}
\\
\text{令}x=-1\text{，}y=0\text{，得}t_{0}^{2}+t_0-2=0\text{，解得}t_0=1\text{或} t_0=-2\text{（舍去）}.     {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\left( t\geqslant 0 \right) }
\\
\text{由}t_0=1\text{知，切点为}\left( 2,3 \right) \text{，且切线方程为}y=x+1.
\\
\text{（}3\text{）当}y=0\text{时},t_1=0,t_2=4\text{知}L\text{与}x\text{轴的交点分别为}\left( 1,0 \right) \text{和}\left( 17,0 \right) 
\\
\text{故所求平面图形的面积为}
\\
S=\int_{-1}^2{\left( x+1 \right)}\mathrm{d}x-\int_1^2{y}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\, =\frac{9}{2}-\int_0^1{\left( 4t-t^2 \right)}\mathrm{d}\left( t^2+1 \right) 
\\
\,\, =\frac{9}{2}-\int_0^1{\left( 4t-t^2 \right) \cdot \left( 2t \right)}\mathrm{d}t
\\
\,\, =\frac{9}{2}-2\int_0^1{\left( 4t^2-t^3 \right)}\mathrm{d}t
\\
\,\, =\frac{9}{2}-2\left( \frac{4}{3}t^3-\frac{t^4}{4} \right) \mid_{0}^{1}
\\
\,\, =\frac{7}{3}.
\\

\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{马思源老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 参数方程求导,凹凸性与拐点大题,以极坐标表达的平面图形的面积,切线与法线,定积分的几何应用

QuestionTxt:
求$\int_0^{\mathrm{\pi}^2}{\sqrt{x}\cos \sqrt{x}\mathrm{d}x=\underline{\qquad\;\;}}.
$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}\int_0^{\pi ^2}{\sqrt{x}}\cos \sqrt{x}\mathrm{d}x\,\,     {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{令}t=\sqrt{x}\text{，则}x=t^2.}
\\
=\int_0^{\pi}{\left( t\cos t \right)}\cdot 2t\mathrm{d}t=\int_0^{\pi}{\cos t}\cdot 2t^2\mathrm{d}t
\\
=2\int_0^{\pi}{t^2}\mathrm{d}\left( \sin t \right) \,\,    {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //“\text{反对幂指三}”\text{，将}t^2\text{看成}u.}
\\
=\left. 2t^2\sin t \right|_{0}^{\pi}-4\int_0^{\pi}{t}\sin t\mathrm{d}t
\\
=-4\int_0^{\pi}{t}\sin t\mathrm{d}t=4\int_0^{\pi}{t}\mathrm{d}\left( \cos t \right) 
\\
=\left. 4t\cos t \right|_{0}^{\pi}-4\int_0^{\pi}{\cos}t\mathrm{d}t
\\
=-4\pi -4\sin t\mid_{0}^{\pi}=-4\pi .
$$
LinkNames: 利用换元法求定积分,利用分部积分法求定积分,定积分计算

QuestionTxt: $\int_0^{\mathrm{\pi}}{x}\sqrt{\cos ^2x-\cos ^4x}\mathrm{d}x=\underline{\qquad\;\; }$.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{定积分做题前先利用被积函数奇偶性周期性，定积分性质等化简}.}
\\
\int_0^{\pi}{x}\sqrt{\cos ^2x-\cos ^4x}\mathrm{d}x\,\,        {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\int_0^{\pi}{xf\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{\pi}{2}\int_0^{\pi}{f\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x}
\\
\begin{array}{l}
	=\frac{\pi}{2}\int_0^{\pi}{\sqrt{\cos ^2x-\cos ^4x}}\mathrm{d}x\\
\end{array}\,\,     {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{周期函数定积分性质}\int_0^T{f\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\int_{-\frac{T}{2}}^{\frac{T}{2}}{f\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x}
\\
=\frac{\pi}{2}\int_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sqrt{\cos ^2x-\cos ^4x}}\mathrm{d}x\,\,      {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //f\left( x \right) \text{为偶函数，}\int_{-a}^a{f\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=2\int_0^a{f\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x}
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sqrt{\cos ^2x-\cos ^4x}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sqrt{\cos ^2x\left( 1-\cos ^2x \right)}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sqrt{\cos ^2x\cdot \sin ^2x}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\left| \left. \cos x\cdot \sin x \right| \right.}\mathrm{d}x\,\,       {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //x\in \left( 0\text{，}\frac{\pi}{2} \right) \text{，}\cos x\cdot \sin x>0.}
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\cos}x\sin x\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\pi \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin x}\mathrm{d}\left( \sin x \right) 
\\
=\pi \cdot \frac{1}{2}\sin ^2x\mid_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}
\\
=\frac{\pi}{2}
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{冯杨老师} \right) \text{】}}
\\

\\

$$
LinkNames: 利用对称性求定积分,利用常用公式求定积分,定积分计算

QuestionTxt: $y=\frac{x^2}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}$在$\left[ \frac{1}{2},\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \right]$上的平均值为$\underline{\qquad\;\;}$.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{定积分物理应用}x\in \left[ a,b \right] \text{，}\bar{y}=\frac{1}{b-a}\int_a^b{y\left( x \right)}\mathrm{d}x.}
\\
\bar{y}=\frac{1}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}-\frac{1}{2}}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}{\frac{x^2}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\, =\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}-1}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}{\frac{x^2}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\, =\left( \sqrt{3}+1 \right) \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}{\frac{x^2}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}}\mathrm{d}x\,\,    {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{令}x=\sin t}
\\
\,\, =\left( \sqrt{3}+1 \right) \int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\frac{\sin ^2t}{\cos t}}\mathrm{d}\left( \sin t \right) 
\\
\,\, =\left( \sqrt{3}+1 \right) \int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\frac{\sin ^2t}{\cos t}}\cdot \cos t\mathrm{d}t
\\
\,\, =\left( \sqrt{3}+1 \right) \int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\sin ^2}t\mathrm{d}t
\\
\,\, =\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{2}\int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\left( 1-\cos 2t \right)}\mathrm{d}t\,\,    {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\sin ^2t=\frac{1}{2}\left( 1-\cos 2t \right) }
\\
\,\, =\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{2}\left( \int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{1}\mathrm{d}t-\int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\cos 2t}\mathrm{d}t \right) 
\\
\,\, =\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{2}\left( \int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{1}\mathrm{d}t-\frac{1}{2}\int_{\frac{\pi}{6}}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}{\cos 2t}\mathrm{d}2t \right) 
\\
\,\, =\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{2}\left( \frac{\pi}{6}-0 \right) 
\\
\,\, =\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{12}\pi 
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{冯杨老师} \right) \text{】}}
\\

$$
LinkNames: 平均值定理,连续与间断

QuestionTxt: 曲线$y=\int_0^x{\tan t\mathrm{d}t}\left( 0\leqslant x\leqslant \frac{\pi}{4} \right)$的弧长为$\underline{\qquad\;\;   }.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
s=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}{\sqrt{1+y'^2}}\mathrm{d}x=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}{\sqrt{1+\tan ^2x}}\mathrm{d}x\,\,    {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\left( \int_0^x{\tan}t\mathrm{d}t \right) '=\tan x.}
\\
=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}{\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\cos x}}=\ln \left| \sec x+\tan x \right|\left| \begin{array}{c}
	\frac{\pi}{4}\\
	0\\
\end{array} \right. =\ln \left( \sqrt{2}+1 \right) .
$$

QuestionTxt: 一根长度为$1$的细棒位于$x$轴的区间$\left[ 0,1 \right]$ 上,若其线密度$\rho \left( x \right) =-x^2+2x+1,$则该细棒的质心坐标$\bar{x}=\underline{\qquad\;\;}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\text{例}12.8 \text{一根长度为}1\text{的细棒位于}x\text{轴的区间}\left[ 0\text{，}1 \right] \text{上，若其线密度}\rho \left( x \right) =-x^2+2x+1\text{，}
\\
\text{则该细棒的质心坐标}\bar{x}=\underline{\,\,      }.
\\
\text{【解】应填}\frac{11}{20}.
\\
\text{质心坐标}{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{（一定要记住此公式）}}
\\
\bar{x}=\frac{\int_0^1{x}\rho \left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}{\int_0^1{\rho}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}=\frac{\int_0^1{\left( -x^3+2x^2+x \right)}\mathrm{d}x}{\int_0^1{\left( -x^2+2x+1 \right)}\mathrm{d}x}==\frac{\left( -\frac{1}{4}x^4+\frac{2}{3}x^3+\frac{1}{2}x^2 \right) \mid_{0}^{1}}{\left( -\frac{1}{3}x^3+x^2+x \right) \mid_{0}^{1}}=\frac{\frac{11}{12}}{\frac{5}{3}}=\frac{11}{20}.
$$
LinkNames: 质心与形心,定积分的物理应用

QuestionTxt: $f\left( x \right)$ 在$[0,+\infty )$上可导,$f\left( 0 \right) =0,$其反函数为$g\left( x \right) ,$若$\int_x^{x+f\left( x \right)}{g}\left( t-x \right) \mathrm{d}t=x^2\ln \left( 1+x \right) ,$求$f\left( x \right) .$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{令}t-x=u\text{，则d}t=\mathrm{d}u\text{，于是}                   {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  //\text{进行换元处理}}
\\
\int_x^{x+f\left( x \right)}{g}\left( t-x \right) \mathrm{d}t=\int_0^{f\left( x \right)}{g}\left( u \right) \mathrm{d}u\,\,            {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  //\text{通过换元区间得到简化}}
\\
\,\,                       =x^2\ln \left( 1+x \right) .
\\
\text{将等式}\int_0^{f\left( x \right)}{g}\left( u \right) \mathrm{d}u=x^2\ln \left( 1+x \right) \text{两边对}x\text{求导，}
\\
\text{同时注意到}g\left[ f\left( x \right) \right] =x\text{，于是有}                   {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}    //f\left( x \right) \text{反函数为}g\left( x \right) }
\\
xf\prime\left( x \right) =2x\ln \left( 1+x \right) +\frac{x^2}{1+x}.
\\
\text{当}x\ne 0\text{时，有}f\prime\left( x \right) =2\ln \left( 1+x \right) +\frac{x}{1+x}\text{，对上式两端积分，得到}
\\
f\left( x \right) =\int{\left[ 2\ln \left( 1+x \right) +\frac{x}{1+x} \right]}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,      =\int{\left[ 2\ln \left( 1+x \right) \right]}\mathrm{d}x+\int{\left[ \frac{x+1-1}{1+x} \right]}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,      =2\left[ x\ln \left( 1+x \right) -\int{\frac{x}{1+x}\mathrm{d}x} \right] +\int{\left[ \frac{x+1-1}{1+x} \right]}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,      =2\left[ x\ln \left( 1+x \right) -\int{\left[ 1-\frac{1}{1+x} \right]}\mathrm{d}x \right] +\int{\left[ 1-\frac{1}{1+x} \right]}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,      =2\left[ \ln \left( 1+x \right) +x\ln \left( 1+x \right) -x \right] +x-\ln \left( 1+x \right) +C
\\
\,\,      =\ln \left( 1+x \right) +2x\ln \left( 1+x \right) -x+C.
\\
\text{可知}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} f\left( x \right) =C\text{，}
\\
\text{由于}f\left( x \right) \text{在}x=0\text{处右连续，又}f\left( 0 \right) =0\text{，解得}C=0\text{，于是}
\\
f\left( x \right) =\ln \left( 1+x \right) +2x\ln \left( 1+x \right) -x.
$$
LinkNames: 积分方程,可分离变量的方程,微分方程的应用

利用夹逼准则求数列极限,变限积分的极限 ,变限积分

QuestionTxt:
$\left( \mathrm{}1 \right)$ 比较$\int_0^1{|}\ln t|\left[ \ln \left( 1+t \right) \right] ^n\mathrm{d}t$与$\int_0^1{t^n}|\ln t|\mathrm{d}t\left( n=1,2,\cdots \right)$ 的大小$，$说明理由$.$
$\left( \mathrm{}2 \right)$ 记$u_n=\int_0^1{|}\ln t|\left[ \ln \left( 1+t \right) \right] ^n\mathrm{d}t\left( n=1,2,\cdots \right) ，$求$\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} u_n.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\left( 1 \right) \text{当}0\leqslant t\leqslant 1\text{时，}0\leqslant \ln \left( 1+t \right) \leqslant t\text{，所以}        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{画图显然可得}}\ln \left( 1+t \right) \leqslant t
\\
\,\,                     0\leqslant |\ln t|\left[ \ln \left( 1+t \right) \right] ^n\leqslant t^n|\ln t|\text{，}        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{同乘一个大于}0\text{的数}}
\\
\text{根据积分的保号性，得}                 {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{被积函数更大，则积分值更大，这就是保号性}}
\\
\int_0^1{|}\ln t|\left[ \ln \left( 1+t \right) \right] ^n\mathrm{d}t\leqslant \int_0^1{t^n}|\ln t|\mathrm{d}t.
\\
\left( 2 \right) \text{由}\left( 1 \right) \text{知，}0\leqslant u_n=\int_0^1{|}\ln t|\left[ \ln \left( 1+t \right) \right] ^n\mathrm{d}t\leqslant \int_0^1{t^n}|\ln t|\mathrm{d}t.
\\
\text{又因为}\int_0^1{t^n}|\ln t|\mathrm{d}t=-\int_0^1{t^n}\ln t\mathrm{d}t\,\,                             {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{因为}\ln t\text{在}\left( 0,1 \right) \text{上为负数}}
\\
=-\left. \frac{t^{n+1}}{n+1}\ln t \right|_{0}^{1}+\frac{1}{n+1}\int_0^1{t^n}\mathrm{d}t\,\,                               {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{分部积分法：反对幂三指}}
\\
=\frac{1}{\left( n+1 \right) ^2}\text{，}
\\
\text{而}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{\left( n+1 \right) ^2}=0
\\
\text{所以}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} \int_0^1{t^n}|\ln t|\mathrm{d}t=0\text{，于是由夹逼准则得}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} u_n=0.
$$
LinkNames: 利用夹逼准则求数列极限,定积分比较大小,定积分的概念与性质

QuestionTxt: 设$f\left( x \right)$ 在$\left[ 0,1 \right]$ 上连续，在$\left( 0,1 \right)$ 内可导，且$f\left( 1 \right) =k\int_0^{\frac{1}{k}}{x\mathrm{e}^{1-x}f\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}\left( k>1 \right) .$证明：至少存在一点$\xi \in \left( 0,1 \right) ，$使得$f'\left( \xi \right) =\left( 1-\xi ^{-1} \right) f\left( \xi \right) .$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{令}F\left( x \right) =x\mathrm{e}^{-x}f\left( x \right) .    {\color{blue} \varparallel \text{请自行分析辅助函数的由来}.}
\\
\text{由积分中值定理，}f\left( 1 \right) =k\int_0^{\frac{1}{k}}{x\mathrm{e}^{1-x}f\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}=\eta \mathrm{e}^{1-\eta}f\left( \eta \right) ,\eta \in \left( 0,\frac{1}{k} \right) \subset \left( 0,1 \right) ,
\\
\text{即}1\cdot \mathrm{e}^{-1}f\left( 1 \right) =\eta \mathrm{e}^{-\eta}f\left( \eta \right) \text{，所以}F\left( 1 \right) =F\left( \eta \right) \text{，则}F\left( x \right) \text{在}\left[ \eta ,1 \right] \text{上满足罗尔定理}
\\
\text{的条件，于是存在}\xi \in \left( \eta ,1 \right) \subset \left( 0,1 \right) ,\text{使得}F'\left( \xi \right) =0,\text{即}f^'\left( \xi \right) =\left( 1-\xi ^{-1} \right) f\left( \xi \right) .\text{证毕}.
$$
LinkNames: 利用罗尔定理证明中值等式,中值定理

$\left( 1 \right)$存在$\xi \in \left( 0,1 \right)$，使得$f\left( \xi \right) =1$；

QuestionTxt:
设函数$f\left( x \right)$ 在$\left[ 0,3 \right]$ 上连续，在$\left( 0,3 \right)$ 内有二阶导数，且$2f\left( 0 \right) =\int_0^2{f\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}=f\left( 2 \right) +f\left( 3 \right) .$
证明：
$\left( 1 \right)$ 存在$\eta \in \left( 0,2 \right) ，$使得$f\left( \eta \right) =f\left( 0 \right) ；$
$\left( 2 \right)$ 存在$\xi \in \left( 0,3 \right) ，$使得$f''\left( \xi \right) =0.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{（}1\text{）设}F\left( x \right) =\int_0^x{f}\left( t \right) \mathrm{d}t\left( 0\leqslant x\leqslant 2 \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{则}\int_0^2{f}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x=F\left( 2 \right) -F\left( 0 \right) .                                   
\\
\text{根据拉格朗日中值定理可知，存在}\eta \in \left( 0,2 \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{使}F\left( 2 \right) -F\left( 0 \right) =\left( 2-0 \right) F^'\left( \eta \right) =2f\left( \eta \right) \text{，}                  
\\
\text{即}\int_0^2{f}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x=2f\left( \eta \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{由题设已知条件有}\int_0^2{f}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x=2f\left( 0 \right) \text{，从而}f\left( \eta \right) =f\left( 0 \right) .
\\
\text{（}2\text{）由于}f\left( x \right) \text{在}\left[ 2,3 \right] \text{上连续，}                            
\\
\text{则其在}\left[ 2,3 \right] \text{上必有最大值}M\text{和最小值}m\text{，于是}
\\
m\leqslant f\left( 2 \right) \leqslant M,\quad 
\\
m\leqslant f\left( 3 \right) \leqslant M\text{，}
\\
\text{故}m\leqslant \frac{f\left( 2 \right) +f\left( 3 \right)}{2}\leqslant M.
\\
\text{根据连续函数的介值定理可知，存在}\tau \in \left[ 2,3 \right] \text{，}
\\
\text{使}f\left( \tau \right) =\frac{f\left( 2 \right) +f\left( 3 \right)}{2}
\\
\text{由题设，}\frac{f\left( 2 \right) +f\left( 3 \right)}{2}=f\left( 0 \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{故}f\left( \tau \right) =f\left( 0 \right) \text{，由（}1\text{）的结果可知}f\left( 0 \right) =f\left( \eta \right) =f\left( \tau \right) \text{，且}0<\eta <\tau \leqslant 3.
\\
\text{根据罗尔定理可知，存在}\xi _1\in \left( 0,\eta \right) , \xi _2\in \left( \eta ,\tau \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{使}f'\left( \xi _1 \right) =f'\left( \xi _2 \right) =0\text{，从而存在}\xi \in \left( \xi _1,\xi _2 \right) \subset \left( 0,3 \right) \text{，使得}f''\left( \xi \right) =0.
$$
LinkNames: 介值定理,罗尔定理,中值定理
罗尔定理,积分中值定理,中值定理

QuestionTxt:
($\,2011$，数二 ) 一容器的内侧是由图$13-4$中曲线绕$y$轴旋转一周而成的曲面，该曲线z$x^2+y^2=2y\left( y\geqslant \frac{1}{2} \right)$ 与$x^2+y^2=1\left( y\leqslant \frac{1}{2} \right)$连接而成.
$\left( 1 \right)$ 求容器的体积；
$\left( 2 \right)$ 若将容器内盛满的水从容器顶部全部抽出，至少需要做多少功？( 长度单位为${\rm m}$，重力加速度 .为 ${\rm g}$单位为${\rm m/s^2}，$水的密度为$10^3{\rm kg/m^3}$ ) 

![image.png](http://ysj-question.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/Yjs/202205/8534b8aa-8cbe-4561-a9cb-fa13ca07bf09.png_yjs)
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\left( 1 \right) \text{因为两个曲线围成图形关于}y=\frac{1}{2}\text{对称，故仅考虑}-1\leqslant y\leqslant \frac{1}{2}\text{部分，}
\\
\text{曲线方程为}x=f\left( y \right) =\sqrt{1-y^2}\left( -1\le y\le \frac{1}{2} \right) \text{，记容积为}V.
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{曲线}x=f\left( y \right) \text{与}y=a,y=b\text{及}y\text{轴围成图形绕}y\text{轴旋转一周得}V=\int_a^b{\pi}f^2\left( y \right) \mathrm{d}y.}
\\
V=2\int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\pi}f^2\left( y \right) \mathrm{d}y\,\,     {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{微元法思想取d}y.}
\\
\,\,=2\pi \int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\mathrm{d}y=2\pi \left( \frac{3}{2}-\left. \frac{1}{3}y^3 \right|_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}} \right) 
\\
\,\,=2\pi \left[ \frac{3}{2}-\frac{1}{3}\left( \frac{1}{8}+1 \right) \right] =2\pi \left( \frac{3}{2}-\frac{3}{8} \right) =\frac{9}{4}\pi .
\\
\left( 2 \right) \text{容器内侧曲线}x=f\left( y \right) \text{如题（I）所示，在}y\text{轴上取}\left[ y,y+\mathrm{d}y \right] \text{，}
\\
\text{对应容器的小薄片的水的重量为}\rho g\pi f^2\left( y \right) \mathrm{d}y\text{（}\rho \text{为水的密度），}   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //m=\rho gV_{\text{排}}.}
\\
\text{它升高的距离为}2-y.\text{将此薄片抽出所做的功为d}W.
\\
\text{则d}W=\rho g\pi f^2\left( y \right) \left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y.
\\
\text{于是全部抽出容器内的水所做的功为}W.
\\
W=\int_{-1}^2{\rho}g\pi f^2\left( y \right) \left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y
\\
\,\, =\rho g\pi \left[ \int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( 2y-y^2 \right)}\left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y \right] 
\\
W_2=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( 2y-y^2 \right)}\left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y
\\
\,\,  =\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left[ 1-\left( 1-y \right) ^2 \right]}\left[ 1+\left( 1-y \right) \right] \mathrm{d}y\,\,   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{令}1-y=t.}
\\
\,\,  =\int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-t^2 \right)}\left( 1+t \right) \mathrm{d}t=\int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\left( 1+y \right) \mathrm{d}y.
\\
\text{将}W_2=\int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\left( 1+y \right) \mathrm{d}y\text{带入}W\text{中}.
\\
W=\rho g\pi \left[ \int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\left( 2-y \right) \mathrm{d}y+\int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\left( 1-y^2 \right)}\left( 1+y \right) \mathrm{d}y \right] 
\\
\,\, =\rho g\pi \int_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}}{3}\left( 1-y^2 \right) \mathrm{d}y
\\
\,\, =\rho g\pi \cdot 3\left( \frac{3}{2}-\left. \frac{1}{3}y^3 \right|_{-1}^{\frac{1}{2}} \right) 
\\
\,\, =\rho g\pi \cdot 3\left[ \frac{3}{2}-\frac{1}{3}\left( \frac{1}{8}+1 \right) \right] 
\\
\,\, =\rho g\pi \frac{27}{8}=\frac{27\times 10^3}{8}g\pi \left( \mathrm{J} \right) .
\\

$$
LinkNames: 以参数方程表达的旋转体的体积,抽水做功,定积分的物理应用

QuestionTxt:
设曲线$L$的方程为$y=\frac{1}{4}x^2-\frac{1}{2}\ln x\left( 1\leqslant x\leqslant \mathrm{e} \right) .$
$\left( 1 \right)$ 求$L$的弧长；
$\left( 2 \right)$ 设$D$是由曲线$L$，直线$x=1$，$x=\mathrm{e}$及$x$轴所围平面图形.求$D$的形心的横坐标.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\left( 1 \right) {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{曲线由直角坐标}y=y\left( x \right) \text{给出，则}s=\int_a^b{\sqrt{1+\left[ y'\left( x \right) \right] ^2}}\mathrm{d}x.}
\\
s=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{1+\left[ y'\left( x \right) \right] ^2}}\mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{1+\left[ \frac{1}{4}x^2-\frac{1}{2}\ln x \right] '^2}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{1+\left[ \frac{1}{2}\left( x-\frac{1}{x} \right) \right] ^2}}\mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{4}\left( x-\frac{1}{x} \right) ^2}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{4}\left( x^2+\frac{1}{x^2}-2 \right)}}\mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}x^2+\frac{1}{4}\frac{1}{x^2}+\frac{1}{2}}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\sqrt{\frac{\left( x^2+1 \right) ^2}{4x^2}}}\mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\left| \left. \frac{x^2+1}{2x} \right| \right.}\mathrm{d}x\,\,   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //x\in \left( 1\text{，e} \right) \text{，}\frac{x^2+1}{2x}>0.}
\\
\,\,=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\frac{x^2+1}{2x}}\mathrm{d}x=\left. \frac{1}{4}x^2 \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}+\left. \frac{1}{2}\ln x \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}=\frac{1}{4}\left( \mathrm{e}^2+1 \right) .
\\
\left( 2 \right) {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{形心公式，}D\text{的形心的横坐标为}\bar{x}=\frac{\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x}y\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}{\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{y}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}.}
\\
\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x}y\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x}\left( \frac{1}{4}x^2-\frac{1}{2}\ln x \right) \mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\frac{1}{4}x^3}\mathrm{d}x-\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x\frac{1}{2}\ln x}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,              =\left. \frac{1}{4^2}x^4 \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}-\frac{1}{4}\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\ln}x\mathrm{d}\left( x^2 \right) =\frac{1}{4^2}\left( \mathrm{e}^4-1 \right) -\left. \frac{1}{4}x^2\ln x \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}+\frac{1}{4}\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x^2}\cdot \frac{1}{x}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,              =\frac{1}{4^2}\left( \mathrm{e}^4-1 \right) -\frac{1}{4}\mathrm{e}^2+\left. \frac{1}{4}\cdot \frac{1}{2}x^2 \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}=\frac{\mathrm{e}^4-2\mathrm{e}^2-3}{4^2}.
\\
\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{y}\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\left( \frac{1}{4}x^2-\frac{1}{2}\ln x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\frac{1}{4}x^2}\mathrm{d}x-\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{\frac{1}{2}\ln x}\mathrm{d}x\,\,  
\\
\,\,             =\left. \frac{1}{12}x^3 \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}-\left. \frac{1}{2}x\ln x \right|_{1}^{\mathrm{e}}+\frac{1}{2}\int_1^{\mathrm{e}}{x}\cdot \frac{1}{x}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{1}{12}\left( \mathrm{e}^3-1 \right) -\frac{1}{2}\mathrm{e}+\frac{1}{2}\left( \mathrm{e}-1 \right) 
\\
\,\,             =\frac{1}{12}\left( \mathrm{e}^3-7 \right) .
\\
\text{故}\bar{x}=\frac{3}{4}\frac{\mathrm{e}^4-2\mathrm{e}^2-3}{\mathrm{e}^3-7}.
$$
LinkNames: 以直角坐标表达的平面曲线的弧长,质心与形心,定积分的几何应用

QuestionTxt: 求曲线$y=3-|x^2-1|$与$x$轴围成的封闭区域绕直线$y=3$旋转所得的旋转体的体积.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{定积分应用问题首先判断函数的性质}}
\\
\text{所给的函数为偶函数，对称轴是}x=0\text{，只研究曲线的右半部分绕}y=3\text{旋转所成的体积}.
\\
\text{当}x\geqslant 0\text{时，}y=\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x^2+2\text{，}0\leqslant x\leqslant 1\\
	4-x^2\text{，}1\leqslant x\leqslant 2\\
\end{array} \right. 
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{因为分段函数各段函数关系不一样，所以分开求解}}
\\
\symbol{"2460} \text{对}\left[ x\text{，}x+\mathrm{d}x \right] \subset \left[ 0\text{，}1 \right] \,\,     
\\
\mathrm{d}V_1=\pi \left\{ 3^2-\left[ 3-\left( x^2+2 \right) \right] ^2 \right\} \mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,  =\pi \left( 2x^2-x^4+8 \right) \mathrm{d}x
\\
V_1=\pi \int_0^1{\left( 2x^2-x^4+8 \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{127\pi}{15}
\\
\symbol{"2461} \text{对}\left[ x\text{，}x+\mathrm{d}x \right] \subset \left[ 1\text{，}2 \right] 
\\
\mathrm{d}V_2=\pi \left\{ 3^2-\left[ 3-\left( 4-x^2 \right) \right] ^2 \right\} \mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,   =\pi \left( 2x^2-x^4+8 \right) \mathrm{d}x
\\
V_2=\pi \int_1^2{\left( 2x^2-x^4+8 \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{97\pi}{15}
\\
\text{则}V=2\left( V_1+V_2 \right) =\frac{448\pi}{15}.
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{冯杨老师} \right) \text{】}}
\\

\\

\\

$$
LinkNames: 以直角坐标表达的旋转体的体积,定积分的几何应用
以直角坐标表达的旋转体的体积,切线与法线,定积分的几何应用

QuestionTxt:

QuestionTxt:
函数$y=C_1\mathrm{e}^x+C_2\mathrm{e}^{-2x}+x\mathrm{e}^x$满足的一个微分方程是$\left(\quad\;\;\right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $y''-y'-2y=3x\mathrm{e}^x.$
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $y''-y'-2y=3\mathrm{e}^x.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $y''+y'-2y=3x\mathrm{e}^x.$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $y''+y'-2y=3\mathrm{e}^x.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】e}^{-2x}\text{与e}^x\text{是齐次方程的两个线性无关的解，特征根}\lambda _1=-2, \lambda _2=1
\\
\text{齐次方程为}y''+y'-2y=0\text{；}
\\
x\mathrm{e}^x\text{是非齐次方程的特解，代入可得右端}f\left( x \right) =3\mathrm{e}^x\text{；}
\\
\text{因此所求方程为}y''+y'-2y=3\mathrm{e}^x. \text{选}D.
$$
LinkNames: 二阶常系数微分方程,微分方程解的结构,微分方程解的性质,微分方程的应用

QuestionTxt:
在下列微分方程中，以$y=C_1\mathrm{e}^x+C_2\cos 2x+C_3\sin 2x(C_1，C_2，C_3$为任意常数)为通解的是$\left(\quad\;\;\right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $y'''+y''-4y'-4y=0.$
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $y'''+y''+4y'+4y=0.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $y'''-y''-4y'+4y=0.$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $y'''-y''+4y'-4y=0.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{从通解的结构知三阶线性常系数齐次方程相应的三个特征根为}1,\pm 2i.
\\
\text{对应的特征方程是}\left( \lambda -1 \right) \left( \lambda +2i \right) \left( \lambda -2i \right) =\left( \lambda -1 \right) \left( \lambda ^2+4 \right) =\lambda ^3-\lambda ^2+4\lambda -4=0.
\\
\text{从而可知微分方程是}y'''-y''+4y'-4y=0.\text{选}\left( \mathrm{D} \right) 
\\

$$
LinkNames: 高阶常系数微分方程,微分方程解的结构,微分方程的应用

QuestionTxt: 设$y=y\left( x \right)$ 是区间$\left( -\mathrm{\pi},\mathrm{\pi} \right)$ 内过$\left( -\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{\sqrt{2}},\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{\sqrt{2}} \right)$的光滑曲线,当$-\mathrm{\pi}<x<0$时,曲线上任一点处的法线都过原点,当$0\leqslant x<\pi$ 时,函数$y\left( x \right)$ 满足$y''+y+x=0.$求函数$y\left( x \right)$ 的表达式.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{曲线在点}\left( x,y \right) \text{处的法线方程为}
\\
Y-y=-\frac{1}{y\prime}\left( X-x \right) \,\,                  {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{切线斜率为}y\prime\text{，切线斜率}\times \text{法线斜率}=-1\text{，故法线斜率}=-\frac{1}{y\prime}}
\\
\text{当}-\pi <x<0\text{时}
\\
\text{法线过原点},\text{将}X=Y=0\text{代入上式得}y=-\frac{x}{y\prime}
\\
\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}y=-x\,\,       {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}   //\text{可分离变量型}}
\\
\Rightarrow y\mathrm{d}y=-x\mathrm{d}x
\\
\int{y\mathrm{d}y}=\int{-x\mathrm{d}x}+C
\\
\Rightarrow y^2=-x^2+C
\\
\text{因为曲线过点}\left( -\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}},\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}} \right) ,\text{代入得}C=\pi ^2
\\
\text{故}y=\sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2}\,\,       \left( -\pi <x<0 \right) \,\,       {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}    //y=-\sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2}\text{不满足过点}\left( -\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}},\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}} \right) \text{，故舍去}}
\\
\text{则所求曲线为}x^2+y^2=\pi ^2\quad 
\\
\text{当}0\leqslant x<\pi \text{时},y''+y+x=0
\\
\Rightarrow y''+y=-x
\\
\text{特征方程}r^2+1=0\Rightarrow r=\pm i
\\
\text{齐次方程的通解为}y=e^{0x}\left( C_1\cos x+C_2\sin x \right) =C_1\cos x+C_2\sin x
\\
\text{设特解}y^*=ax+b\text{代入}y''+y=-x\text{得}a=-1\text{，}b=0\Rightarrow \text{特解}y^*=-x
\\
\text{所以非齐次方程的通解为}y=C_1\cos x+C_2\sin x-x\,\,    \left( 0\leqslant x<\pi \right) 
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{由于曲线是光滑的},\text{所以有：}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \,\,          \lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} y\left( x \right) =\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} y\left( x \right) =y\left( 0 \right) }
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \,\,          y_{-}^{\prime}\left( 0 \right) =y_{+}^{\prime}\left( 0 \right) }
\\
\text{由}\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} y\left( x \right) =\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} y\left( x \right) =y\left( 0 \right) \text{可得}:
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \left( C_1\cos x+C_2\sin x-x \right) =\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2}\,\,=C_1
\\
\Rightarrow C_1=\pi 
\\
\Rightarrow y=\pi \cos x+C_2\sin x-x\,\,     \left( 0\leqslant x<\pi \right) 
\\
\text{由}y_{-}^{\prime}\left( 0 \right) =y_{+}^{\prime}\left( 0 \right) \text{可得}:
\\
\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{f\left( x \right) -f\left( 0 \right)}{x-0}=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \frac{f\left( x \right) -f\left( 0 \right)}{x-0}\,\,
\\
\Rightarrow \lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{\pi \cos x+C_2\sin x-x-\pi}{x}=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \frac{\sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2}-\pi}{x}\,\,         
\\
\Rightarrow \lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{\pi \left( \cos x-1 \right)}{x}+\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{C_2\sin x}{x}-1=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \frac{-x^2}{x\left( \sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2}+\pi \right)}\,\,               {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}   //\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{C_1\left( \cos x-1 \right)}{x}=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^+} \frac{C_1\left( -\frac{1}{2}x^2 \right)}{x}=0}
\\
\Rightarrow 0+C_2-1=\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow 0^-} \frac{-x}{2\pi}=0
\\
\Rightarrow C_2=1
\\
\text{故}y=\begin{cases}
	\sqrt{\pi ^2-x^2},               -\pi <x<0\\
	\pi \cos x+\sin x-x,      0\leqslant x<\pi\\
\end{cases}
\\

$$
LinkNames: 二阶常系数微分方程,切线与法线,高阶微分方程

$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $F''_{xx}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) >0.$    
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $F''_{xx}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) <0.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $F''_{yy}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) >0.$    
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $F''_{yy}\left( x_0,y_0 \right) <0.$
LinkNames: 隐函数求导,单调性与极值最值大题,导数的几何应用

设$F\left( x,y \right)$ 在点$\left( x_0,y_0 \right)$ 的某邻域内有二阶连续偏导数,且$F\left( x_0,y_0 \right) =0,F_{x}'\left( x_0,y_0 \right) =0,F_{y}'\left( x_0,y_0 \right) >0,$$F_{xx}''\left( x_0,y_0 \right) <0,$则由方程$F\left( x,y \right) =0$确定的隐函数$y=y\left( x \right)$ 在点$x=x_0$处$\left( \quad \;\; \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ 取得极小值.
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ 取得极大值.

QuestionTxt:
设函数$u\left( x,y \right)$在有界闭区域上连续,在$D$的内部具有二阶连续偏导数,且满足$\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x\partial y}\ne 0$及$\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2}+\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial y^2}=0,$则$\left( \quad\;\;   \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $u\left( x,y \right)$ 的最大值和最小值都在$D$的边界上取得.
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $u\left( x,y \right)$ 的最大值和最小值都在$D$的内部取得.
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $u\left( x,y \right)$ 的最大值在$D$的内部取得,最小值在$D$的边界上取得.
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $u\left( x,y \right)$ 的最小值在$D$的内部取得,最大值在$D$的边界上取得.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{若}u\left( x,y \right) \text{在}D\text{内部某点}M_0\left( x_0,y_0 \right) \text{取最值，而}u\left( x,y \right) \text{在有界闭区域}D\text{上连续且具有二阶连续偏导数，}
\\
\left. \text{则此时最值点必是极值，满足：}\frac{\partial u}{\partial x} \right|_{M_0}=0,\left. \frac{\partial u}{\partial y} \right|_{M_0}=0,\text{且}AC-B^2>0,
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{以上是当函数存在偏导数时，最值点的必要条件，根据极值的判别条件，}}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2}\text{，}\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial y^2}\text{应该为同号，且由于假设该点为最小值点，故}\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2}\text{应大于等于}0.}
\\
\text{又}\left. \left( \frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2}+\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial y^2} \right) \right|_{M_0}=0\Rightarrow A=\left. \frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2} \right|_{M_0}=0,C=\left. \frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial y^2} \right|_{M_0}=0\text{，}
\\
\text{又}B=\left. \frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x\partial y} \right|_{M_0}\ne 0\Rightarrow AC-B^2=-B^2<0\Rightarrow M_0\text{不是}u\left( x,y \right) \text{的极值点，得矛盾}.
\\
\text{因此}u\left( x,y \right) \text{不能在}D\text{内部取到极值}.
\\
\text{因此}u\left( x,y \right) \text{的最大值和最小值都在}D\text{的边界取得，选（A）}.
$$
LinkNames: 闭区域最值,多元函数的应用

QuestionTxt:
设$u\left( x,y \right)$ 在平面有界闭区域$D$上具有二阶连续偏导数,且$\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x\partial y}\ne 0,\frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial x^2}\cdot \frac{\partial ^2u}{\partial y^2}=0,$则$u\left( x,y \right)$ 的$\left( \quad \;\; \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ 最大值点和最小值点必定都在$D$的内部.
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ 最大值点和最小值点必定都在$D$的边界上.
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ 最大值点在$D$的内部,最小值点在$D$的边界上.
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ 最小值点在$D$的内部,最大值点在$D$的边界上.

QuestionTxt:

QuestionTxt: $z=\frac{y}{x}f\left( xy \right) +yg\left( x^2+y^2 \right)$ ,其中$f$,$g$二阶连续可导,则$\frac{\partial ^2z}{\partial x\partial y}=\underline{\qquad\;\;}.$
LinkNames: 抽象复合函数求高阶偏导数,多元函数的计算

QuestionTxt: 已知函数$f\left( u,v \right)$ 具有二阶连续偏导数,$f\left( 1,1 \right) =2$是$f\left( u,v \right)$ 的极值,$z=f\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] .$求$\left. \frac{\partial ^2z}{\partial x\partial y} \right|_{\left( 1,1 \right)}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】填}f_{11}^{''}\left( 2,2 \right) +f_{2}^{\prime}\left( 2,2 \right) f_{12}^{''}\left( 1,1 \right) .
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{变量替换得：}}
\\
\text{令}f_1=x+y,f_2=f\left( x,y \right) \text{，则由复合函数求导得：}
\\
\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial z}{\partial f_1}\cdot \frac{\mathrm{d}f_1}{\mathrm{d}x}+\frac{\partial z}{\partial f_2}\cdot \frac{\mathrm{d}f_2}{\mathrm{d}x}
\\
\,\,   =f_{1}^{\prime}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] +f_{2}^{\prime}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot f_{1}^{\prime}\left( x,y \right) \text{，}
\\
\frac{\partial ^2z}{\partial x\partial y}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left( \frac{\partial z}{\partial y} \right) =\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left( \frac{\partial z}{\partial x} \right) \,\,
\\
\,\,       =f_{11}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot 1+f_{12}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot f_{2}^{\prime}\left( x,y \right) \cdot 1+
\\
\,\,          f_{2}^{\prime}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot f_{11}^{''}\left( x,y \right) +f_{1}^{\prime}\left( x,y \right) \left\{ f_{21}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot 1+ \right. 
\\
\,\,        \left. f_{22}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] \cdot f_{2}^{\prime}\left( x,y \right) \right\} .
\\
\text{由题意知}f_{1}^{\prime}\left( 1,1 \right) =0,f_{2}^{\prime}\left( 1,1 \right) =0\text{，}f\left( 1,1 \right) =2\text{，}                                      
\\
\text{从而}\left. \frac{\partial ^2z}{\partial x\partial y} \right|_{\left( 1,1 \right)}=f_{11}^{''}\left( 2,2 \right) +f_{2}^{\prime}\left( 2,2 \right) f_{12}^{''}\left( 1,1 \right) .
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{因为函数}f\left( u,v \right) \text{具有二阶连续偏导数，所以混合偏导数}f_{12}^{''}=f_{21}^{''},\text{则}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} f_{12}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] =f_{21}^{''}\left[ x+y,f\left( x,y \right) \right] .}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{游仁青老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 抽象复合函数求高阶偏导数,多元函数的计算

QuestionTxt:
某企业为生产甲、乙两种型号的产品投入的固定成本为$10000$( 万元 ) .设该企业生产甲、乙两种产品的产量分别为$x$( 件 ) 和$y$( 件 ) ，且这两种产品的边际成本分别为$20+\frac{x}{2}$( 万元/件 ) 与$6+y$( 万元/件 ) .
$\left( 1 \right)$ 求生产甲、乙两种产品的总成本函数$C\left( x,y \right)$ ( 万元 ) ；
$\left( 2 \right)$ 当总产量为$50$件时,甲、乙两种产品的产量各为多少时可使总成本最小？求最小总成本；
$\left( 3 \right)$ 求总产量为$50$件且总成本最小时甲产品的边际成本，并解释其经济意义.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{（}1\text{）由边际成本概念知}\frac{\partial C}{\partial x}=20+\frac{x}{2},\frac{\partial C}{\partial y}=6+y.
\\
\text{又}C\left( 0,0 \right) =10000\text{，得总成本函数}C\left( x,y \right) =10000+20x+\frac{x^2}{4}+6y+\frac{y^2}{2}.
\\
\text{（}2\text{）}{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法一}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} }\text{由题设知}x+y=50\text{，此时的总成本函数为}
\\
f\left( x \right) =C\left( x,50-x \right) =10000+20x+\frac{x^2}{4}+6\left( 50-x \right) +\frac{\left( 50-x \right) ^2}{2},0\leqslant x\leqslant 50,
\\
\text{求导得}f\prime\left( x \right) =\frac{3x}{2}-36.\text{令}f\prime\left( x \right) =0\text{，解得唯一驻点}x=24.
\\
\text{又}f''\left( 24 \right) =\frac{3}{2}>0\text{，所以}x=24\text{是总成本函数}f\left( x \right) \text{的最小值点，故当甲产量为}24\text{件，乙产量为}26\text{件时，}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{设函数}f\left( x \right) \text{在}x_0\text{的某邻域}U\text{上一阶可导，在}x_0\text{处二阶可导，}f^{\prime}\left( x_0 \right) =0,f''\left( x_0 \right) \ne 0\text{；}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} \left( 1 \right) \text{若}f''\left( x_0 \right) <0\text{，则}f\left( x \right) \text{在}x_0\text{处取极大值；}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} \left( 2 \right) \text{若}f''\left( x_0 \right) >0\text{，则}f\left( x \right) \text{在}x_0\text{处取极小值}.}
\\
\text{总成本达到最小，最小总成本为}C\left( 24,26 \right) =11118\text{（万元）}.
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法二}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} }\text{作拉格朗日函数}
\\
F\left( x,y,\lambda \right) =C\left( x,y \right) +\lambda \left( x+y-50 \right) .
\\
\,\,           =10000+20x+\frac{x^2}{4}+6y+\frac{y^2}{2}+\lambda \left( x+y-50 \right) .
\\
\text{令}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	F_{x}^{\prime}=20+\frac{1}{2}x+\lambda =0,  \\
	F_{y}^{\prime}=6+y+\lambda =0,       \\
	F_{\lambda}^{\prime}=x+y-50=0,     \\
\end{array} \right. 
\\
-\text{得}\lambda -x+56=0,\text{则}\lambda =x-56\text{代入}\text{得}x=24\text{，}
\\
\text{进而得}y=26\text{；故最小总成本为}C\left( 24,26 \right) =11118\text{（万元）}.
\\
\text{（}3\text{）由边际成本的定义知，所求边际成本为}\left. \frac{\partial C}{\partial x} \right|_{x=26}=\left. \left( 20+\frac{x}{2} \right) \right|_{x=26}=32.
\\
\text{其经济意义：当生产甲产品}24\text{件，乙产品}26\text{件时，生产第}25\text{件甲产品需}32\text{万元}.
\\

\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{游仁青老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 一个约束条件,经济学五大函数,经济应用

QuestionTxt:
设函数$f\left( x,y \right)$ 连续，则二次积分$\int_{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}}^{\mathrm{\pi}}{\mathrm{d}x\int_{\sin x}^1{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y}$等于$( \quad\;\;)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y\int_{\mathrm{\pi}+\mathrm{arc}\sin y}^{\mathrm{\pi}}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x}.$
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y\int_{\mathrm{\pi}-\mathrm{arc}\sin y}^{\mathrm{\pi}}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x}.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y\int_{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}}^{\mathrm{\pi}+\mathrm{arc}\sin y}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x}.$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y\int_{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}}^{\mathrm{\pi}-\mathrm{arc}\sin y}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x}.
$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步}:\text{确定积分区域}}
\\
\text{由累次积分限确定积分区域}D\text{如图}11-6\text{所示}.
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步}:\text{求解函数}x=x\left( y \right) }
\\
\text{因为}y=\sin x\text{中}x\text{的取值区间为}\left[ \frac{\pi}{2},\pi \right] ,\text{而}x=\mathrm{arc}\sin y\text{中}x\text{的取值区间为}\left[ -\frac{\pi}{2},\frac{\pi}{2} \right] .
\\
\text{因此做变化得}y=\sin x=\sin \left( \pi -x \right) .
\\
\text{当}\frac{\pi}{2}\leqslant x\leqslant \pi \text{时},0\leqslant \pi -x\leqslant \frac{\pi}{2},\text{可得}\pi -x=\mathrm{arc}\sin y,\text{即}x=\pi -\mathrm{arc}\sin y.
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第三步}:\text{确定积分上下限}}
\\
\text{由上述推论可得积分上限为直线}x=\pi ,\text{积分下限为}x=\pi -\mathrm{arc}\sin y.
\\
\text{因此有}I=\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y\int_{\pi -\mathrm{arc}\sin y}^{\pi}{f\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x}}.\text{选（B）}.
$$
LinkNames: 交换积分次序,二重积分换系与换序

QuestionTxt:
设$f\left( x,y \right)$ 是连续函数,则$\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}}y\int_{-\sqrt{1-y^2}}^{1-y}{f}$$\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x=( \quad\;\; )$
$( \mathrm{A} )$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}}x\int_0^{x-1}{f}$$\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y+\int_{-1}^0{\mathrm{d}}x\int_0^{\sqrt{1-x^2}}{f}$$\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y.$
$( \mathrm{B} )$ $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}}x\int_0^{1-x}{f}$$\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y+\int_{-1}^0{\mathrm{d}}x\int_{-\sqrt{1-x^2}}^0{f}$$\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y.$
$( \mathrm{C} )$ $\int_0^{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^{\frac{1}{\cos \theta +\sin \theta}}{f}$$\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) \mathrm{d}r+\int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\mathrm{\pi}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^1{f}$$\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) \mathrm{d}r.$
$( \mathrm{D} )$ $\int_0^{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^{\frac{1}{\cos \theta +\sin \theta}}{f}$$\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) r\mathrm{d}r+\int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\mathrm{\pi}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^1{f}$$\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) r\mathrm{d}r.
$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{记}I=\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}}y\int_{-\sqrt{1-y^2}}^{1-y}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x=\iint\limits_D{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}\sigma ,
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步，先确定积分域}}
\\
D\text{如图}11-11\left( D=\{\left( x,y \right) |0\leqslant y\leqslant 1,-\sqrt{1-y^2}\leqslant x\leqslant 1-y \right) .
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步，变换积分顺序}}
\\
\text{若改为先}y\text{后}x\text{的积分顺序，}\left( \mathrm{A} \right) ,\left( \mathrm{B} \right) \text{均不对，}
\\
\text{应该为}\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}}x\int_0^{1-x}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y+\int_{-1}^0{\mathrm{d}}x\int_0^{\sqrt{1-x^2}}{f}\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}y
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第三步，极坐标变换}}
\\
\text{此时}x+y=1\text{的极坐标方程是}r=\frac{1}{\cos \theta +\sin \theta}\text{，}
\\
\text{于是}I=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^{\frac{1}{\cos \theta +\sin \theta}}{f}\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) r\mathrm{d}r+\int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^1{f}\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) r\mathrm{d}r
\\
\text{故选}\left( \mathrm{D} \right) .
$$
LinkNames: 交换积分次序,极直互化,二重积分换系与换序

QuestionTxt:
区域$D$由曲线$y=\sin x,x=\pm \frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2},$$y=1$围成,则$\iint\limits_D{\left( xy^5-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y$的值为$(   \quad\;\;)$
$( \mathrm{A} )$ $\mathrm{\pi}.$　　       
$( \mathrm{B} )$ $2.$
$( \mathrm{C} )$ $-2.$        
$( \mathrm{D} )$ $-\mathrm{\pi}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{添加辅助线}y=-\sin x\text{，将}D\text{分成}D_1,D_2,D=D_1\cup D_2.
\\
\text{由于}D_1\text{关于}y\text{轴对称，}D_2\text{关于}x\text{轴对称（如图}5.23\text{），于是}
\\
\iint\limits_D{x}y^5\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y=\iint\limits_{D_1}{x}y^5\mathrm{d}\sigma +\iint\limits_{D_2}{x}y^5\mathrm{d}\sigma =0+0=0.        {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{重积分的对称性}.}
\\
I=\iint\limits_D{\left( xy^5-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y=\iint\limits_D{-}1\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y=-\int_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}x\int_{\sin x}^1{1}\mathrm{d}y=-\int_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\left( 1-\sin x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=-\pi .
\\
\text{故选（D）}.
$$
LinkNames: 利用对称性计算二重积分,二重积分的计算

QuestionTxt:
设$D_k$是圆域$D=\left\{ \left( x,y \right) |x^2+y^2\le 1 \right\}$ 位于第$k$象限的部分，记$I_k=\iint\limits_{D_k}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y
\left( k=1,2,3,4 \right) ，$则$\left( \quad \;\; \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $I_1>0.$                       
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $I_2>0.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $I_3>0.$                       
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $I_4>0.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
I_1=\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y
\\
\,\, =\iint\limits_{D_1}{x}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\,\,        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{由于区域}D_1\text{关于直线}y=x\text{对称，根据轮换对称性得出}}
\\
\,\, =\iint\limits_{D_1}{y}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\,\,               
\\
\,\, =0
\\
\text{类似地可知}I_3=0\text{，故选项}\left( \mathrm{A} \right) \text{和}\left( \mathrm{C} \right) \text{不正确}.
\\
I_2=\iint\limits_{D_2}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\,\,        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{在区域}D_2\text{内}y-x\geqslant 0\text{且等号不恒成立，由二重积分的性质可知}\iint\limits_{D_2}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y>0}
\\
\,\, =\iint\limits_{D_2}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y>0         
\\
\text{即}I_2>0\text{成立}.\text{类似地可知}\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left( y-x \right)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y<0\text{，即}I_4>0\text{不成立，排除选项}\left( \mathrm{D} \right) .
\\
\text{综上可知，选项}\left( \mathrm{B} \right) \text{正确}.
\\

\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{林世钰老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 二重积分比较大小,利用对称性计算二重积分,二重积分的计算

QuestionTxt: $\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y}\int_{\frac{y}{2}}^y{\cos}x^2\mathrm{d}x+\int_1^2{\mathrm{d}y}\int_{\frac{y}{2}}^1{\cos}x^2\mathrm{d}x=\underline{\qquad\;\;}$.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y}\int_{\frac{y}{2}}^y{\cos}x^2\mathrm{d}x+\int_1^2{\mathrm{d}y}\int_{\frac{y}{2}}^1{\cos}x^2\mathrm{d}x\,\,   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{交换积分次序}}
\\
=\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}x}\int_x^{2x}{\cos}x^2\mathrm{d}y
\\
=\int_0^1{x}\cos x^2\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\frac{1}{2}\int_0^1{\cos x^2}\mathrm{d}\left( x^2 \right) \,\,   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\int_0^1{\cos x^2}\mathrm{d}\left( x^2 \right) \,\,\xlongequal{\text{令}x^2=u}\int_0^1{\cos u}\mathrm{d}u}
\\
=\frac{1}{2}\sin x^2\mid_{0}^{1}
\\
=\frac{1}{2}\sin 1 
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{郑淑清老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$

QuestionTxt: 改变积分次序并计算$\int_{\frac{1}{4}}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}y\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{\sqrt{y}}{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}}\mathrm{d}x+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{\mathrm{d}}y\int_y^{\sqrt{y}}{\mathrm{e}}^{\frac{y}{x}}\mathrm{d}x$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{因为}\left\{ \begin{array}{c}
	\frac{1}{4}<y<\frac{1}{2}\\
	\frac{1}{2}<x<\sqrt{y}\\
\end{array} \right. \text{和}\left\{ \begin{array}{c}
	\frac{1}{2}<y<1\\
	y<x<\sqrt{y}\\
\end{array} \right. }
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{画出区域图可知，改变积分次序后，}\frac{1}{2}\leqslant x\leqslant 1\text{，}x^2\leqslant y\leqslant x}
\\
\int_{\frac{1}{4}}^{\frac{1}{2}}{\mathrm{d}y}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{\sqrt{y}}{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}}\mathrm{d}x+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{\mathrm{d}y}\int_y^{\sqrt{y}}{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{\mathrm{d}x}\int_{x^2}^x{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}}\mathrm{d}y\,\,  {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\int_{x^2}^x{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}}\mathrm{d}y=x\mathrm{e}^{\frac{y}{x}}\mid_{e^2}^{x}=x\left( \mathrm{e}-\mathrm{e}^x \right) }
\\
=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{x}\left( \mathrm{e}-\mathrm{e}^x \right) \mathrm{d}x
\\
=\mathrm{e}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{x}\mathrm{d}x-\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{x\mathrm{e}^x}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=\mathrm{e}\cdot \frac{1}{2}x^2\mid_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}-\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{x}\mathrm{d}\left( \mathrm{e}^x \right) \,\, 
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{分部积分}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{x}\mathrm{d}\left( \mathrm{e}^x \right) =x\mathrm{e}^x\mid_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}-\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^1{\mathrm{e}^x}\mathrm{d}x=\mathrm{e}-\frac{1}{2}\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2}}-\mathrm{e}+\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}}
\\
=\frac{3\mathrm{e}}{8}-\frac{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}}{2}
\\
\text{故原式}=\frac{3\mathrm{e}}{8}-\frac{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}}{2}.
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{郑淑清老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 交换积分次序,二重积分换系与换序

QuestionTxt: 计算$\iint\limits_D{\left| x^2+y^2-1 \right|\mathrm{d}\sigma},$其中$D=\{\left( x,y \right) |0\leqslant x\leqslant 1,0\leqslant y\leqslant 1\}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步}:\text{将积分去绝对值分块}}
\\
\symbol{"2460} \text{当}x^2+y^2>1\text{时},\text{有}\left| x^2+y^2-1 \right|=x^2+y^2-1;
\\
\symbol{"2461} \text{当}x^2+y^2<1\text{时},\text{有}\left| x^2+y^2-1 \right|=1-\left( x^2+y^2 \right) .
\\
\text{因此积分区域可以用圆弧}x^2+y^2=1\left( x\geqslant 0,y\geqslant 0 \right) \text{分成两部分}
\\
D_1:\left\{ \left( x,y \right) |x^2+y^2\leqslant 1,x\geqslant 0,y\geqslant 0 \right\} ,D_2:\left\{ \left( x,y \right) |x^2+y^2\geqslant 1,0\leqslant x\leqslant 1,0\leqslant y\leqslant 1 \right\} .
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步}:\text{计算分块后的积分}}
\\
\iint\limits_D{\left| x^2+y^2-1 \right|}\mathrm{d}\sigma =\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left[ 1-\left( x^2+y^2 \right) \right]}\mathrm{d}\sigma +\iint\limits_{D_2}{\left( x^2+y^2-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma \,\,
\\
=\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left[ 1-\left( x^2+y^2 \right) \right]}\mathrm{d}\sigma +\left[ \iint\limits_D{\left( x^2+y^2-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma -\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left( x^2+y^2-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma \right] 
\\
=2\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left[ 1-\left( x^2+y^2 \right) \right]}\mathrm{d}\sigma +\iint\limits_D{\left( x^2+y^2-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma 
\\
\symbol{"2460} \text{计算前式}:
\\
2\iint\limits_{D_1}{\left[ 1-\left( x^2+y^2 \right) \right]}\mathrm{d}\sigma \,\,   {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{令}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x=r\cos \theta\\
	y=r\sin \theta\\
\end{array} \right. ,\text{则}\iint\limits_D{f\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}\sigma}=\int_{\alpha}^{\beta}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_{r_1\left( \theta \right)}^{r_2\left( \theta \right)}{f}\left( r\cos \theta ,r\sin \theta \right) r\mathrm{d}r}
\\
=2\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\mathrm{d}\theta}\int_0^1{\left( 1-r^2 \right)}r\mathrm{d}r\,\,           {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{当一个被积分变量未参与到另一个积分计算时},\text{可以分别进行积分}}
\\
=2\cdot \theta \mid_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\cdot \left( \frac{r^2}{2}-\frac{r^4}{4} \right) \mid_{0}^{1}
\\
=2\cdot \frac{\pi}{2}\left( \frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4} \right) =\frac{\pi}{4}.
\\
\symbol{"2461} \text{计算后式}:
\\
\iint\limits_D{\left( x^2+y^2-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma \,\,            {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{被积区间}D\text{关于}y=x\text{对称},\text{因此具有轮转对称性}}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{设}D\text{关于直线}y=x\text{对称},\text{则}\iint\limits_D{f\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=\iint\limits_D{f\left( y,x \right) \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y},\text{故}}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\iint\limits_D{f\left( x,y \right) \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=\frac{1}{2}\iint\limits_D{\left[ f\left( x,y \right) +f\left( y,x \right) \right] \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}}
\\
=\iint\limits_D{2x^2}\mathrm{d}\sigma -\iint\limits_D{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma \,\,         {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{由积分的几何意义得}\iint\limits_D{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma =S_D=1}
\\
=2\iint\limits_D{x^2}\mathrm{d}\sigma -1=2\int_0^1{\mathrm{d}y}\int_0^1{x^2}\mathrm{d}x-1
\\
=2\cdot y\mid_{0}^{1}\cdot \frac{x^3}{3}\mid_{0}^{1}-1=\frac{2}{3}-1=-\frac{1}{3}.
\\
\text{因此}I=\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{1}{3}.
$$

QuestionTxt: 计算$\iint\limits_D{\max \left\{ xy,1 \right\}}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y,$其中$D=\left\{ \left( x,y \right) \mid 0\leqslant x\leqslant 2,0\leqslant y\leqslant 2 \right\} .$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法一}:}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步}:\text{将积分区域分块}}
\\
\text{被积函数}\max \left\{ xy,1 \right\} \text{为分块函数},\text{因此应当分别计算积分}.
\\
\text{积分区域被曲线}xy=1\left( \text{即}y=\frac{1}{x} \right) \text{分成两部分},\text{记}D_1:xy\leqslant 1;D_2:xy\geqslant 1  \left( x,y \right) \in D.
\\
\text{其中}D_1\text{由分段函数组成},\text{因此再次拆分为}D_1=D_{11}\cup D_{12},\text{如图}11-17\text{，有}
\\
I=\iint\limits_D{\max}\{xy,1\}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y=\iint\limits_{D_{11}}{1\mathrm{d}\sigma}+\iint\limits_{D_{12}}{1\mathrm{d}\sigma}+\iint\limits_{D_2}{xy\mathrm{d}\sigma}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步}:\text{计算拆分后的积分}}
\\
\symbol{"2460} \text{计算}\iint\limits_{D_{11}}{1\mathrm{d}\sigma}:
\\
\text{由积分的几何意义得}\iint\limits_{D_{11}}{1\mathrm{d}\sigma}=S_{D_{11}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot 2=1.
\\
\symbol{"2461} \text{计算}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_0^{\frac{1}{x}}{1\mathrm{d}y}:
\\
\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_0^{\frac{1}{x}}{1\mathrm{d}y}=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( y\mid_{0}^{\frac{1}{x}} \right) \mathrm{d}x}=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\frac{1}{x}\mathrm{d}x}=\left. \ln x \right|_{\frac{1}{2}}^{2}=2\ln 2.
\\
\symbol{"2462} \text{计算}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_{\frac{1}{x}}^2{xy\mathrm{d}y}:
\\
\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_{\frac{1}{x}}^2{xy\mathrm{d}y}=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( \frac{1}{2}xy^2\mid_{\frac{1}{x}}^{2} \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( 2x-\frac{1}{2}\frac{1}{x} \right)}\mathrm{d}x=x^2\mid_{\frac{1}{2}}^{2}-\frac{1}{2}\ln x\mid_{\frac{1}{2}}^{2}=\left( 4-\frac{1}{4} \right) -\ln 2.
\\
\text{因此有}I=\frac{19}{4}+\ln 2.
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法二}:}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步}:\text{将积分区域分块}}
\\
D_1,D_2\text{分区同解法一}.
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步}:\text{计算拆分后的积分}}
\\
I=\iint\limits_{D_1}{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma +\iint\limits_{D_2}{xy\mathrm{d}\sigma}\,\,      {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\iint\limits_{D_1}{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma =\iint\limits_D{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma -\iint\limits_{D_2}{1}\mathrm{d}\sigma ,}
\\
=4-\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_{\frac{1}{x}}^2{\mathrm{d}y}+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\mathrm{d}x}\int_{\frac{1}{x}}^2{xy\mathrm{d}y}
\\
=4-\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\left( 2-\frac{1}{x} \right)}\mathrm{d}x+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\frac{1}{2}}xy^2\mid_{\frac{1}{x}}^{2}\mathrm{d}x
\\
=4-2\cdot \frac{3}{2}+\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^x{\frac{1}{x}\mathrm{d}x}+2\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{x\mathrm{d}x}-\frac{1}{2}\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^2{\frac{1}{x}\mathrm{d}x}
\\
=1+\left. \frac{1}{2}\ln x \right|_{\frac{1}{2}}^{2}+x^2\mid_{\frac{1}{2}}^{2}
\\
=\frac{19}{4}+\ln 2.
$$

QuestionTxt: 设$D=\left\{ \left( x,y \right) \left| x^2+y^2\leqslant \sqrt{2},x\geqslant 0,y\geqslant 0 \right. \right\} ，\left[ 1+x^2+y^2 \right]$ 表示不超过$1+x^2+y^2$的最大整数，计算二重积分$\iint\limits_D{xy\left[ 1+x^2+y^2 \right] \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\iint\limits_D{x}y\left[ 1+x^2+y^2 \right] \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\,\,     {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{含}x^2+y^2\text{首先想到把直角坐标转化为极坐标方程}}
\\
=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^{\sqrt{2}}{r^3}\sin \theta \cos \theta \cdot \left[ 1+r^2 \right] \mathrm{d}r\,\,     
\\
=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin}\theta \cos \theta \mathrm{d}\theta \int_0^{\sqrt[4]{2}}{r^3}\left[ 1+r^2 \right] \mathrm{d}r\,\,          {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  \begin{array}{c}
	//\text{因为}\left[ 1 \right. +x^2+\left. y^2 \right] \text{表示不超过}1+x^2+y^2\text{的最大整数},\\
	//\text{需要把区间分为大于}1\text{和小于}1\text{两部分}.                      \\
\end{array}}\,\, 
\\
=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin}\theta \cos \theta \mathrm{d}\theta \int_0^1{r^3}\mathrm{d}r+\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin}\theta \cos \theta \mathrm{d}\theta \int_1^{\sqrt[4]{2}}{2r^3}\mathrm{d}r
\\
=\frac{1}{2}\left( \int_0^1{r^3}\mathrm{d}r+\int_1^{\sqrt[4]{2}}{2}r^3\mathrm{d}r \right) 
\\
=\frac{1}{2}\left( \frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2} \right) 
\\
=\frac{3}{8}.                           
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} \,\,                                                                                 }
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{林世钰老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$

QuestionTxt: 计算$\iint\limits_D{\frac{\sqrt{x^2+y^2}}{\sqrt{4a^2-x^2-y^2}}}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y$$\left( a>0 \right)$ ,其中区域$D$是由直线$y=-x$与曲线$y=-a+\sqrt{a^2-x^2}$所围成的第四象限的区域.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步：化成极坐标系下的运算，并画出区域}D\text{的图形}}
\\
\text{令}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x=r\cos \theta\\
	y=r\sin \theta\\
\end{array}\left( -\frac{\pi}{4}\leqslant \theta \leqslant 0,0\leqslant r\leqslant -2a\sin \theta \right) \right. 
\\
\text{则}I=\iint\limits_D{\frac{\sqrt{x^2+y^2}}{\sqrt{4a^2-x^2-y^2}}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=\int_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^0{\mathrm{d}}\theta \int_0^{-2a\sin \theta}{\frac{r^2}{\sqrt{4a^2-r^2}}}\mathrm{d}r
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步：利用三角函数的公式化简二重积分}}
\\
\text{令}r=2a\sin t\text{，}
\\
\text{则}\int_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^0{\mathrm{d}\theta}\int_0^{-2a\sin \theta}{\frac{r^2}{\sqrt{4a^2-r^2}}}\mathrm{d}r
\\
=\int_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^0{\mathrm{d}\theta}\int_0^{-\theta}{\frac{4a^2\sin ^2t}{2a\cos t}}\times 2a\cos t\mathrm{d}t\,\,      {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{三角函数降幂公式}\sin ^2t=\frac{1-\cos 2t}{2}}
\\
=2a^2\int_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^0{\mathrm{d}\theta}\int_0^{-\theta}{\left( 1-\cos 2t \right)}\mathrm{d}t\,\,     
\\
=2a^2\int_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^0{\left( -\theta +\frac{1}{2}\sin 2\theta \right)}\mathrm{d}\theta 
\\
=2a^2\cdot \left( -\frac{1}{2}\theta ^2-\frac{1}{4}\cos 2\theta \right) \mid_{-\frac{\pi}{4}}^{0}
\\
=a^2\left( \frac{\pi ^2}{16}-\frac{1}{2} \right) .
$$
LinkNames: 利用极坐标计算二重积分,二重积分的计算

下列命题正确的是$\left( \quad \;\; \right)$
$(A)$若正项级数$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}$发散,则$a_n\geqslant \frac{1}{n}\,\,   \left( n>N \right)$.
$(B)$若$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( a_{2n-1}+a_{2n} \right)}$收敛,则$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}$收敛.
$(C)$若$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}$与$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{b_n}$至少有一个发散,则$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( \left| a_n \right|+\left| b_n \right| \right)}$发散.
$(D)$若$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left| a_nb_n \right|}$收敛,则$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_{n}^{2}}$与$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{b_{n}^{2}}$都收敛.
LinkNames: 级数的概念与性质

QuestionTxt:
设$\left\{ a_n \right\}$ 为正项数列，下列选项正确的是$\left(\quad\;\;\right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ 若$a_n>a_{n+1}，则\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( -1 \right) ^{n-1}}a_n$收敛.
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ 若$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( -1 \right) ^{n-1}}a_n$收敛，则$a_n>a_{n+1}.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ 若$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}$收敛，则存在常数$p>1，$使$\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} n^pa_n$存在.
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ 若存在常数$p>1$，使$\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} n^pa_n$存在，则$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}$收敛.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{举反例排除}.}
\\
\symbol{"2460} A\text{选项错误}.\text{选项构造莱布尼茨的交错级数的审敛法的}“\text{单调不减}”\text{的条件，}
\\
\text{但是缺乏}\underset{n\rightarrow \infty}{\lim}a_n=0\text{的条件，所以无法保证}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( -1 \right) ^{n-1}}a_n\text{收敛},\text{反例：}a_n=1+\frac{1}{n}.
\\
\symbol{"2461} B\text{选项错误}.\text{反例：}a_n=\frac{\left( -1 \right) ^n+1}{n^2}\text{，可知} a_n\text{为正项级数，}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( -1 \right) ^{n-1}}a_n=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1+\left( -1 \right) ^{n-1}}{n^2}}\text{，}
\\
\text{等价于}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}}\text{，收敛；但是}a_1=0\text{，}a_2=\frac{1}{2}\text{，可知不是}a_n\text{不是单调减}.  
\\
\symbol{"2462} C\text{选项错误}.\text{反例：}a_n=\frac{1}{n\ln ^2n}\text{，可知}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}\text{收敛，}\left\{ a_n \right\} \text{为正项数列，}
\\
\text{但是}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} n^pa_n=\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} \frac{n^p}{n\ln ^2n}\text{存在时，仅当}p\leqslant 1\text{成立}.  {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{记住这个反例}.}
\\
\symbol{"2463} D\text{选项正确}.\text{证明：若存在常数}p>1\text{，使}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} n^pa_n\text{存在，即}\lim\limits_{n\rightarrow \infty} \frac{a_n}{\frac{1}{n^p}}=a\text{存在，又因为}P>1\text{时，}
\\
\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^p}}\text{收敛，根据正项级数的比较审敛法，可知}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}\text{和}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^p}}\text{同敛散，所以}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n}\text{收敛},
\\
\text{故选}\left( D \right) .
\\

$$
LinkNames: 正项级数的审敛,常数项级数

QuestionTxt: 设幂级数$\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{a_nx^n}$的收敛半径为$3$，则幂级数$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{na_n\left( x-1 \right) ^{n+1}}$的收敛区间为$\underline{\qquad\;\;     }.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{na_n\left( x-1 \right) ^{n+1}}=\left( x-1 \right) ^2\cdot \sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{na_n\left( x-1 \right) ^{n-1}}=\left( x-1 \right) ^2\cdot \left[ \sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\left( x-1 \right) ^n} \right] '
\\
\text{由于逐项求导不改变收敛半径，故}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{na_n\left( x-1 \right) ^{n+1}}\text{与}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\left( x-1 \right) ^n}\text{相同，}
\\
\text{而}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\left( x-1 \right) ^n}\text{的收俩半径为}3.\text{故收敛区间为}-3<\left( x-1 \right) <3\text{，即}-2<x<4.
$$
LinkNames: 求幂级数的收敛半径和收敛区间,幂级数

QuestionTxt: 设$x^2=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{a_n\cos nx}，\left( -\mathrm{\pi}\leqslant x\leqslant\mathrm{\pi} \right)$ ，则$a_2=\underline{\qquad\;\;        }．$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
a_2=\frac{2}{\pi}\int_0^{\pi}{x^2}\cos 2x\mathrm{d}x=\frac{2}{2\pi}\int_0^{\pi}{x^2}\mathrm{d}\sin 2x=\frac{1}{\pi}\left[ x^2\sin 2x\mid_{0}^{\pi}-2\int_0^{\pi}{x\sin 2x}\mathrm{d}x \right] 
\\
\,\, =\frac{1}{\pi}\left[ 0+\int_0^{\pi}{x}\mathrm{d}\cos 2x \right] =\frac{1}{\pi}\left[ x\cos 2x\mid_{0}^{\pi}-\int_0^{\pi}{\cos 2x}\mathrm{d}x \right] =\frac{1}{\pi}\left[ \pi -0 \right] =1.
$$
LinkNames: 傅里叶级数

QuestionTxt: 将函数$f\left( x \right) =x-1\left( 0\leqslant x\leqslant 2 \right)$展开成周期为$4$的余弦级数.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{要将函数展开为余弦级数，则对函数进行偶延拓，再进行周期延拓，}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{周期为}2l\text{的偶函数}f\left( x \right) \text{的傅里叶级数}S\left( x \right) =\frac{a_0}{2}+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\cos \frac{\pi}{l}nx}\text{，}x\in \left( -\infty ,+\infty \right) \,\,          }
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{其中}a_0=\frac{2}{l}\int_0^l{f\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x},a_n=\frac{2}{l}\int_0^l{f\left( x \right) \cos \frac{\pi}{l}nx\mathrm{d}x},b_n=0}
\\
a_0=\frac{2}{2}\int_0^2{f\left( x \right) \mathrm{d}x}=\int_0^2{\left( x-1 \right)}\mathrm{d}x=\frac{\left( x-1 \right) ^2}{2}\mid_{0}^{2}=0
\\
a_n=\frac{2}{2}\int_0^2{f}\left( x \right) \cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x=\int_0^2{\left( x-1 \right)}\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\,  =-\int_0^2{\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x}+\int_0^2{x\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x}
\\
\,\,  =-\frac{2}{n\pi}\sin \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mid_{0}^{2}+\int_0^2{x\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x}=0+\int_0^2{x\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x}\,\,                    {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{分部积分法}}
\\
\,\,  =\frac{2}{n\pi}\int_0^2{x\mathrm{d}\sin \frac{n\pi x}{2}}=\frac{2}{n\pi}\left( x\sin \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mid_{0}^{2}-\int_0^2{\sin \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mathrm{d}x} \right) 
\\
\,\,  =-\frac{2}{n\pi}\left( -\frac{2}{n\pi}\cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mid_{0}^{2} \right) =\frac{4}{n^2\pi ^2}\left( \cos \frac{n\pi x}{2}\mid_{0}^{2} \right) 
\\
\,\,  =\frac{4}{n^2\pi ^2}\left[ \left( -1 \right) ^n-1 \right] =\left\{ \begin{matrix}
	-\frac{8}{n^2\pi ^2},&		\,\,n\text{为奇数}\\
	0,&		n\text{为偶数}\\
\end{matrix} \right. \left( n=1,2,3,\cdots \right) 
\\
b_n=0\left( n=1,2,\cdots \right) \text{，}
\\
\text{于是}f\left( x \right) 
\\
=\frac{a_0}{2}+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\cos \frac{\pi}{l}nx}=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_n\cos \frac{n\pi}{2}x}\,\,                      {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{分解为奇数项和偶数项}}
\\
=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{a_{2n}\cos \frac{2n\pi}{2}x}+\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{a_{2n+1}\cos \frac{\left( 2n+1 \right) \pi}{2}x}
\\
=0+\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{a_{2n+1}\cos \frac{\left( 2n+1 \right) \pi}{2}x}
\\
=-\frac{8}{\pi ^2}\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2n+1 \right) ^2}}\cos \frac{\left( 2n+1 \right) \pi x}{2}\text{，}\left( 0\leqslant x\leqslant 2 \right) 
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品（胡颖老师）】}}
$$
LinkNames: 傅里叶级数

已知函数$f\left( x \right) =\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2}\cdot \frac{\mathrm{e}^x+\mathrm{e}^{-x}}{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{\pi}}-\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{\pi}}}.$
$\left( 1 \right)$ 求$f\left( x \right)$ 在$\left[ -\mathrm{\pi},\mathrm{\pi} \right]$ 上的傅里叶级数,

$\left( 3 \right)$ 求积分$\int_0^{+\infty}{\frac{1}{x^3\left( \mathrm{e}^{\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{x}}-1 \right)}}\mathrm{d}x.$

QuestionTxt: 将函数$f\left( x \right) =2+|x|\left( -1\leqslant x\leqslant 1 \right)$ 展开成以$2$为周期的傅里叶级数,并由此求级数$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}}$的和.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{作}f\left( x \right) \text{的草图并进行周期延拓，是连续函数}}
\\
\text{由于}f\left( x \right) =2+|x|\text{为偶函数，则}
\\
b_n=0,n=1,2,\cdots 
\\
a_0=2\int_0^1{\left( 2+x \right)}\mathrm{d}x=5
\\
a_n=2\int_0^1{\left( 2+x \right)}\cos n\pi x\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\, =4\int_0^1{\cos n\pi x}\mathrm{d}x+\int_0^1{2}x\cos n\pi x\mathrm{d}x
\\
\,\, =\frac{4}{n\pi}\int_0^1{\cos n\pi x}\mathrm{d}\left( n\pi x \right) +\frac{2}{n\pi}\int_0^1{x}\mathrm{d}\sin n\pi x
\\
\,\, =\frac{4}{n\pi}\left( \sin n\pi x \right) \mid_{0}^{1}+\frac{2}{n\pi}\left[ x\sin n\pi x\mid_{0}^{1}-\frac{1}{n\pi}\int_0^1{\sin n\pi x}\mathrm{d}n\pi x \right] 
\\
\,\, =0+\frac{2}{n\pi}\left[ 0+\frac{1}{n\pi}\left( \cos n\pi x \right) \mid_{0}^{1} \right] 
\\
\,\, =\frac{2\left( \cos n\pi -1 \right)}{n^2\pi ^2}
\\
\,\, =\frac{2\left[ \left( -1 \right) ^n-1 \right]}{n^2\pi ^2},\quad \left( n=1,2,\cdots \right) 
\\
\text{由狄利克雷收敛定理知：}        {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}                    //\text{由草图知}f\left( x \right) \text{连续}}
\\
\begin{aligned}
	2+|x|=\frac{a_0}{2}+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\left( a_n\cos \frac{\pi}{l}nx+b_n\sin \frac{\pi}{l}nx \right) \,\,                     {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  //\text{本题}l=1}}\,\,\\
	&=\frac{5}{2}+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{2\left[ \left( -1 \right) ^n-1 \right]}{n^2\pi ^2}}\cos n\pi x, x\in \left[ -1,1 \right]\\
\end{aligned}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{实际上：}\frac{2\left[ \left( -1 \right) ^n-1 \right]}{n^2\pi ^2}=\begin{cases}
	0,          n\text{为偶数时}\\
	-\frac{4}{n^2\pi ^2}\text{，}  n\text{为奇数时}\\
\end{cases}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\frac{5}{2}+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{2\left[ \left( -1 \right) ^n-1 \right]}{n^2\pi ^2}}\cos n\pi x=\frac{5}{2}-\frac{4}{\pi ^2}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{\cos \left( 2k+1 \right) \pi x}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} }2+|x|=\frac{5}{2}-\frac{4}{\pi ^2}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{\cos \left( 2k+1 \right) \pi x}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}},\quad x\in \left[ -1,1 \right] .
\\
\text{令}x=0\text{，得}2=\frac{5}{2}-\frac{4}{\pi ^2}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}}.
\\
\text{则}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}}=\frac{\frac{5}{2}-2}{\frac{4}{\pi ^2}}=\frac{\pi ^2}{8}
\\
\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}}=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}}+\sum\limits_{k=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2k \right) ^2}}
\\
\,\,        =\sum\limits_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\left( 2k+1 \right) ^2}}+\frac{1}{4}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}}. 
\\
\text{设}A=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}},\text{则：}A=\frac{\pi ^2}{8}+\frac{1}{4}A
\\
\Rightarrow A=\frac{\pi ^2}{6}
\\
\text{故}\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{n^2}}=\frac{\pi ^2}{6}.
$$
LinkNames: 傅里叶级数

QuestionTxt:
设函数$f\left( x,y \right)$ 在点$\left( 0,0 \right)$ 附近有定义，且偏导数$f_{x}'\left( 0,0 \right) =3，f_{y}'\left( 0,0 \right)=1$，则$\left( \quad\;\;\right)$ .
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $\mathrm{d}z\big|_{\left( 0,0 \right)}^{\,\,}=3\mathrm{d}x+\mathrm{d}y$.
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ 曲面$z=f\left( x,y \right)$ 在点$\left(0,0,f\left( 0,0 \right) \right)$ 的法向量为$\left\{ 3,1,1 \right\}$ .
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $曲线\begin{cases}z=f\left( x,y \right)\\y=0\\
\end{cases}$在点$\left( 0,0,f\left( 0,0 \right) \right)$ 的切向量为$\left\{ 1,0,3 \right\}$.
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ 曲线$\begin{cases}z=f\left( x,y \right)\\y=0\\
\end{cases}$在点$\left( 0,0,f\left( 0,0 \right) \right)$ 的切向量为$\left\{ 3,0,1 \right\} .$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{本题考查了以下三个基本性质}.
\\
\symbol{"2460} \text{函数}z=f\left( x,y \right) \text{在点}M_0\left( x_0,y_0 \right) \text{存在偏导数}\left. \frac{\partial z}{\partial x} \right|_{M_0},\left. \frac{\partial z}{\partial y} \right|_{M_0}\text{，并不能保证}z=f\left( x,y \right) 
\\
\text{在点}M_0\text{可微分}.\text{因此，（A）不正确}.              {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{偏导数存在，但不一定可微分}.}
\\
\symbol{"2461} \text{由于存在偏导数并不一定能保证函数可微分，}
\\
\text{不能说明曲面}z=f\left( x,y \right) \text{在相应点}\left( x_0,y_0,f\left( x_0,y_0 \right) \right) \text{处存在切平面，可见（B）也不正确}.  
\\
\symbol{"2462} \text{对C与D选项进行分析}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法一}}\text{曲线}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	z=f\left( x,y \right)\\
	y=0\\
\end{array} \right. \text{可看作参数式：}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x=t\\
	y=0\\
	z=f\left( t,0 \right)\\
\end{array} \right. \text{，则}
\\
\vec{\tau}=\left. \left( x_t',y_t',z_t' \right) \right|_{t=0}=\left( 1,0,f_x'\left( 0,0 \right) \right) =\left( 1,0,3 \right) .\text{故（C）正确}.
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{解法二}}\text{曲线}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	z=f\left( x,y \right)\\
	y=0\\
\end{array} \right. \text{还可看作一般式：}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	f\left( x,y \right) -z=0\\
	y=0\\
\end{array} \right. \text{，}
\\
\text{则}\vec{\tau}=\vec{n}_1\times \vec{n}_2\,\,                        {\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{向量}\vec{n}_1\text{对应}f\left( x,y \right) -z=0\text{；向量}\vec{n}_2\text{对应y}=0\text{；}}
\\
=\left( f_{x}^{'}\left( 0,0 \right) ,f_{y}^{'}\left( 0,0 \right) ,-1 \right) \times \left( 0,1,0 \right) \,\,{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{从对应等式中通过求偏导，或者观察系数求得对应向量}.}
\\
=\left| \begin{matrix}
	\vec{i}&		\vec{j}&		\vec{k}\\
	3&		1&		-1\\
	0&		1&		0\\
\end{matrix} \right|=0+0+\vec{k}\times 3\times 1-0-0-\vec{i}\times 1\times \left( -1 \right) =\vec{i}+3\vec{k}
\\
\text{于是，}\vec{\tau}=\left( 1,0,3 \right) .\text{故（C）正确}.
$$
LinkNames: 空间曲线的切线与法平面,空间曲面的切平面与法线,多元函数的应用

设$f_x'\left( 0,0 \right) =1，f_y'\left( 0,0 \right) =2$，则$\left( \quad\;\;\right)$ .

QuestionTxt:
曲面$x^2+\cos \left( xy \right) +yz+x=0$在点$\left( 0,1,-1 \right)$ 处的切平面方程为$\left( \quad\;\;\right)$ 
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $x-y+z=-2．$ 
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $x+y+z=0．$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $x-2y+z=-3．$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $x-y-z=0.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第一步：先求法向量}.}
\\
\text{记}F\left( x,y,z \right) =x^2+\cos \left( xy \right) +yz+x,\text{先求出曲面}F\left( x,y,z \right) =\text{在点}\left( 0,1,-1 \right) \text{处的法向量}.
\\
\boldsymbol{n}=\left. \left( \frac{\partial F}{\partial x},\frac{\partial F}{\partial y},\frac{\partial F}{\partial z} \right) \right|_{\left( 0,1,-1 \right)}=\left. \left( 2x+1-y\sin \left( xy \right) ,-x\sin \left( xy \right) +z,y \right) \right|_{\left( 0,1,-1 \right)}=\left( 1,-1,1 \right) .
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\text{求法向量的值为所设切平面方程各项前面的系数}.}
\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{第二步：法向量代入切平面方程}.}
\\
\text{于是曲面在点（}0,1,-1\text{）的切平面方程是}x-\left( y-1 \right) +\left[ z-\left( -1 \right) \right] =0,\text{即}x-y+z+2=0.
\\
\text{故选}\left( \mathrm{A} \right) .
$$
LinkNames: 空间曲面的切平面与法线,多元函数的应用

QuestionTxt: 设$\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}=2,$则$\left[ \left( \boldsymbol{a}+\boldsymbol{b} \right) \times \left( \boldsymbol{b}+\boldsymbol{c} \right) \right] \cdot \left( \boldsymbol{c}+\boldsymbol{a} \right) =\underline{\qquad\;\;}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\begin{array}{l}
	\left[ \left( \boldsymbol{a}+\boldsymbol{b} \right) \times \left( \boldsymbol{b}+\boldsymbol{c} \right) \right] \cdot \left( \boldsymbol{c}+\boldsymbol{a} \right)\\
	=\left[ \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b}+\boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{c}+\boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{b}+\boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right] \cdot \left( \boldsymbol{c}+\boldsymbol{a} \right) \,\,    {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}    //\boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{b}=0}\\
	=\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}+\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{a}+\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}+\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{a}+\left( \boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}+\left( \boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{a}\\
	=\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}+0+0+0+\left( \boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{a}\,\,   {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240} //\text{混合积}\left( \boldsymbol{abc} \right) \text{中只要有两个向量平行},\text{则该混合积为零}}\\
	=\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}+\left( \boldsymbol{b}\times \boldsymbol{c} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{a}\,\,   {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}  //\text{混合积的轮换对称性}}\\
	=2\left( \boldsymbol{a}\times \boldsymbol{b} \right) \cdot \boldsymbol{c}\\
	=4\\
\end{array}\,\,
\\

$$
LinkNames: 向量的概念与运算,向量代数

QuestionTxt: 点$\left( 2,1,0 \right)$ 到平面$3x+4y+5z=0$的距离$d=\underline{\qquad\;\;}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{应填}\sqrt{2}.
\\
\text{由点}P\left( x_0,y_0,z_0 \right) \text{到平面}Ax+By+Cz+D=0\text{的距离公式，可得}
\\
d=\frac{\left| Ax_0+By_0+Cz_0+D \right|}{\sqrt{A^2+B^2+C^2}}
\\
\,\, =\frac{|6+4+0|}{\sqrt{9+16+25}}
\\
\,\, =\sqrt{2}.
$$
LinkNames: 距离问题,平面与直线

QuestionTxt:
与两直线$\begin{cases}
	x=1,\\
	y=-1+t,\\
	z=2+t,\\
\end{cases}$及$\frac{x+1}{1}=\frac{y+2}{2}=\frac{z-1}{1}$都平行,且过原点的平面方程为$\underline{\qquad\;\;}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{方法}1\left( \text{推荐} \right) \text{：}}
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} }\text{显然直线}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	x=1\text{，}\\
	y=-1+t\text{，}\\
	z=2+t.\\
\end{array}\text{及}\frac{x+1}{1}=\frac{y+2}{2}=\frac{z-1}{1} \right. \text{的方向向量分别为}
\\
\boldsymbol{s}_1=\{0,1,1\}\text{和}\boldsymbol{s}_2=\{1,2,1\}.
\\
\text{由题设知所求平面与以上两知直线平行},\text{则所求平面的法向量为}
\\
\boldsymbol{n}=\boldsymbol{s}_1\times \boldsymbol{s}_2=\left| \begin{matrix}
	\boldsymbol{i}		\boldsymbol{j}&		\boldsymbol{k}\\
	0&		1&		1\\
	1&		2&		1\\
\end{matrix} \right|=\{-1,1,-1\}.
\\
\text{平面过原点}\left( 0,0,0 \right) ,\text{则所求平面的方程为}
\\
-\left( x-0 \right) +\left( y-0 \right) -\left( z-0 \right) =0\text{，即}x-y+z=0.
\\
{\color[rgb]{240, 0, 0} \text{方法}2\text{：}}
\\
\text{由题设知},\text{两条已知直线的方向向量分别为}
\\
\boldsymbol{s}_1=\{0,1,1\}\text{和}\boldsymbol{s}_2=\{1,2,1\}.
\\
\text{设}P\left( x,y,z \right) \text{为所求平面上任上点},\text{由题设知向量}\overrightarrow{OP}=\{x,y,z\}\text{可与}\boldsymbol{s}_1\text{和}\boldsymbol{s}_2\text{共面，则}
\\
\left( \overrightarrow{OP}\boldsymbol{s}_1\boldsymbol{s}_2 \right) =0\text{，即}\left| \begin{matrix}
	x&		y&		z\\
	0&		1&		1\\
	1&		2&		1\\
\end{matrix} \right|=0\text{，亦即}-x+y-z=0.
$$
LinkNames: 先二后一,利用柱坐标计算三重积分,三重积分的计算

QuestionTxt:
设$\frac{\left( x+ay \right) \mathrm{d}x+y\mathrm{d}y}{\left( x+y \right) ^2}\left( x+y\ne 0 \right)$为某函数的全微分,则$a$为$\left(\quad\;\;\right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $-1.$
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $0.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $1.$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $2.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
{\color[RGB]{0, 0, 240} //\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial P}{\partial y}\Leftrightarrow P\mathrm{d}x+Q\mathrm{d}y\text{为某函数的全微分}}
\\
\text{由}\frac{\left( x+ay \right) \mathrm{d}x+y\mathrm{d}y}{\left( x+y \right) ^2}\text{得}P\left( x,y \right) =\frac{x+ay}{\left( x+y \right) ^2},Q\left( x,y \right) =\frac{y}{\left( x+y \right) ^2}\text{，}
\\
\text{因为}\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial \left[ \frac{y}{\left( x+y \right) ^2} \right]}{\partial x}=\frac{-2y\cdot \left( x+y \right)}{\left( x+y \right) ^4},
\\
\frac{\partial P}{\partial y}=\frac{\partial \left[ \frac{x+ay}{\left( x+y \right) ^2} \right]}{\partial y}=\frac{\left( x+y \right) \left( ax+ay-2x-2ay \right)}{\left( x+y \right) ^4}.
\\
\text{由}\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial P}{\partial y}\text{得}a=2,\text{故选}\left( \mathrm{D} \right) .
\\

\\
{\color[RGB]{240, 0, 0} \text{【欧几里得出品}\left( \text{马思源老师} \right) \text{】}}
$$
LinkNames: 已知全微分求参数,多元函数的应用

QuestionTxt:
设存在空间区域$\varOmega _1:x^2+y^2+z^2\leqslant R^2,z\geqslant 0$，$\varOmega _2:x^2+y^2+z^2\leqslant R^2,x\geqslant 0,y\geqslant 0,z\geqslant 0，$则$\left(\quad\;\; \right)$
$\left( \mathrm{A} \right)$ $\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{x\mathrm{d}V}=4\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _2}{x\mathrm{d}V}.$
$\left( \mathrm{B} \right)$ $\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{y\mathrm{d}V}=4\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _2}{y\mathrm{d}V}.$
$\left( \mathrm{C} \right)$ $\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{z\mathrm{d}V}=4\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _2}{z\mathrm{d}V}.\,\,$
$\left( \mathrm{D} \right)$ $\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{xyz\mathrm{d}V}=4\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _2}{xyz\mathrm{d}V}.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{积分区域关于}xoz\text{面，}yoz\text{面对称，故三重积分关于}x,y\text{具有奇偶性}
\\
\text{而}x,y,xyz\text{关于}x,y\text{均为奇函数，则}\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{x\mathrm{d}V}=\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{y\mathrm{d}V}=\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{xyz\mathrm{d}V}=0.
\\
z\text{关于}x,y\text{为偶函数，则}\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _1}{z\mathrm{d}V}=4\iiint\limits_{\varOmega _2}{z\mathrm{d}V}.
$$
LinkNames: 利用对称性计算三重积分,三重积分的计算
