QuestionTxt: ( $\,2010$，数一 ) 已知曲线$L$的方程为$y=1-|x|\left( x\in \left[ -1,1 \right] \right)$ ，起点是$\left( -1,0 \right)$ ，终点是$\left( 1,0 \right)$ ，则曲线积分$\int_L{xy\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y}=\underline{\qquad\;\;        }.$
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{补线}L_1\text{：}y=0,-1<x<1 \text{取顺时针方向，}L\text{与}L_1\text{围成的区域为}D
\\
\int_L{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y=\int_{L+L_1}{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y-\int_{L_1}{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y
\\
\text{其中}\int_{L+L_1}{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y=-\iint\limits_D{\left( 2x-x \right) \mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=-\iint\limits_D{x\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y}=0\text{；}
\\
\,\,  \int_{L_1}{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y=0\text{，故}\int_L{x}y\mathrm{d}x+x^2\mathrm{d}y=0-0=0.
$$
LinkNames: 平面上的第二类曲线积分的计算,第二类曲线积分

QuestionTxt:
设函数$\varphi \left( y \right)$ 具有连续导数,在围绕原点的任意分段光滑的简单闭曲线$L$上,曲线积分$\oint\limits_L{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}$的值恒为同一常数.
$\left( 1 \right)$ 证明:对右半面$x>0$内的任意分段光滑简单闭曲线$C$有$\oint\limits_C{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=0.$
$\left( 2 \right)$ 求函数$\varphi \left( y \right)$ 的表达式.
AnswerTxt:
$$
\\
\text{【解析】}
\\
\text{（}1\text{）如图}6-45\text{所示，设}C\text{是半平面}x>0\text{内任一分段光滑简单闭曲线，在}C\text{上任意取定两点}M\text{，}N\text{，}
\\
\text{作围绕原点的闭曲线}\overline{MKNLM}\text{，同时得到另一围绕原点的闭曲线}\overline{MKNTM}\text{由题设条件可知}
\\
\oint\limits_{\overgroup{MKNLM}}{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}-\oint\limits_{\overgroup{MKNTM}}{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=0     
\\
\text{又}\oint\limits_{\overgroup{MKNLM}}{=\int_{\overgroup{MKN}}{+}}\int_{\overgroup{NLM}}{,}\,\,  \oint\limits_{\overgroup{MKNTM}}{=\int_{\overgroup{MKN}}{+\int_{\overgroup{NTM}}{.}}}
\\
\text{所以}\int_{\overgroup{MKN}}{+}\int_{\overgroup{NLM}}{-}\left( \int_{\overgroup{MKN}}{+\int_{\overgroup{NTM}}{}} \right) =0
\\
\text{即：}\int_{\overgroup{NLM}}{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}-\int_{\overgroup{NTM}}{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=0.            {\color[rgb]{0, 0, 240}     //\int_{\overgroup{NLM}}{-\int_{\overgroup{NTM}}{=}}\int_{\overgroup{NLM}}{+\int_{\overgroup{MTN}}{=}}\oint\limits_C{.}}
\\
\text{即：}\oint\limits_C{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=0.
\\
\text{（}2\text{）}
\\
\text{由（}1\text{）知：}\oint\limits_C{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=0
\\
\text{在}x>0\text{的右半平面内，}\oint\limits_C{\text{满足格林公式的使用条件}.}
\\
\text{故}0=\oint\limits_C{\frac{\varphi \left( y \right) \mathrm{d}x+2xy\mathrm{d}y}{2x^2+y^4}}=\iint\limits_D{\left( \,\,\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}-\frac{\partial P}{\partial y} \right)}\mathrm{d}\sigma 
\\
\text{故在}x>0\text{时，总有}\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}\equiv \frac{\partial P}{\partial y}
\\
\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}=\frac{2y\left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) -8x^2y}{\left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) ^2}=\frac{-4x^2y+2y^5}{\left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) ^2}\text{，}
\\
\begin{aligned}
	\frac{\partial P}{\partial y}=\frac{\varphi \prime\left( y \right) \left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) -4\varphi \left( y \right) y^3}{\left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) ^2}\\
	&=\frac{2x^2\varphi \prime\left( y \right) +\varphi \prime\left( y \right) y^4-4\varphi \left( y \right) y^3}{\left( 2x^2+y^4 \right) ^2}\text{，}\\
\end{aligned}
\\
\text{比较}\text{，}\text{式右端得}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	-4x^2y=2x^2\varphi \prime\left( y \right) \text{，}\\
	2y^5=\varphi \prime\left( y \right) y^4-4\varphi \left( y \right) y^3\text{，}\\
\end{array} \right. 
\\
\text{即}\left\{ \begin{array}{l}
	\varphi \prime\left( y \right) =-2y\text{，}\\
	y^4\varphi \prime\left( y \right) -4y^3\varphi \left( y \right) =2y^5.\\
\end{array} \right. 
\\
\text{由}\text{式得}\varphi \left( y \right) =\int{-2y}\mathrm{d}y=-y^2+C
\\
\text{将}\varphi \left( y \right) \text{代入}\text{得}y^4\left( -2y \right) -4y^3\left( -y^2+C \right) =2y^5
\\
\Rightarrow 2y^5-4Cy^3=2y^5
\\
\text{则}C=0\text{，从而}\varphi \left( y \right) =-y^2.
$$
LinkNames: 曲线积分与路径无关,第二类曲线积分
